105a6(tsa): 'bul ba 'di skad do// bde ba chen po gang na gnas pa na// rtag pa chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i tshe// khams gsum las 'das byang chub rin po che//
105a7(tsa): stongs pas btsal kyang rnyed par ga la 'gyur// thig le chen po chub par gnas pa las// ye shes snying po 'di las gzhan med de// 'khor ba myang 'das skye 'chi
105b1(tsa): med pa'i dbyings// bde ba chen po'i ngang la rnam par rol// oM/ ci la bde bas ci yang rol// bde mchog bde dang mi gnyis bde// srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir//
105b2(tsa): mi srid dbyings su mnyam sbyar nas// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // dkyil 'khor sras dang bcas pa la// dam tshig bde mchog 'di 'bul na// nam
105b3(tsa): mkha'i rdo rje stsa la du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+haM ma hA su kha pU dza pra tits+tsha to// de nas 'dus byas rdzas kyi mchod pa 'bu la ba 'di skad do//
105b4(tsa): rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa 'dir// rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs bla re lhab lbub dang // bdug spos dri zhim me tog sil ma bkram// bdud rtsi dri dang
105b5(tsa): snang gas la sgron mer bcas// lha dang mi yi rol mo sna tshogs dang // glu gar de'u dang tshigs su bcad par bstod// bza' btung bdud rtsi bro mchog rnam mang dang /
105b6(tsa): rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun la sogs rdzas// mtshan mchog btsun mo yid du 'ong ba dang // gos dang rgyan dang rin chen chas kyis mdzes// thabs dang rol mo'i tshul
105b7(tsa): gyis pazhes su gsol// bsod nams tshogs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// de nas bla na med pa'i mchod pa dbul ba 'di skad do// bla med
106a1(tsa): mchog gi mchod pa sbyar ba 'di// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod 'kho dgur ldan// nam mkha'i mtha'
106a2(tsa): klas gter chen 'byung gyur cig/ phung po bla med rgyal ba ye shes lnga// 'byung ba bla med gsang ba'i yum mchog lnga// rnam shes yul dus sems dpa' sems ma dang //
106a3(tsa): mchod pa bla med rab 'byor rnams kyis mchod// bla na med pa dus dang rgyun med pas// dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar bzhi bar mdzod// de nas rnam par
106a4(tsa): grol ba'i mchod pa dbul ba 'di skad do// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// sangs rgyas zhing yin rnam grol ba'i// 'dzin med
106a5(tsa): chags dang bral ba yi// 'khor ba'i chos las kun grol bas// mya ngan 'das la dkyil 'khor dgod// rtog bral bag chags med pa las// 'di zhes mtshon
106a6(tsa): pa med pa yis// shes rab shin tu rnam par grol// blo chen po dang tshangs pa'i bdag/ byang chub nyid de rnam grol bas// thabs ldan rol pa'i mchod pa 'bul//
106a7(tsa): gnyis med don gyi tshangs pa stsol// de nas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba 'di skad do// ma chags pa la chags pa med//
106b1(tsa): chags pa la yang chags pa med// bdag med rtogs pa mya ngan 'das// 'dzin med dbyings la ye shes rol// rgyal snyid dang ni rang gi lus// 'phags pa rnams
106b2(tsa): la 'bul gyis bzhes// bu dang chung ma bu mo dang // nor dang dbyig dang sbas pa'i gter// bla ma rnams la 'bul bar bgyis// rta mchog rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //
106b3(tsa): dud 'gro glang chen smen sha dang // 'dab chags la sogs thams cad kyang // 'khor bcas rab 'byam bzhes su gsol// sdug bsngal ba yang sdug bsngal med//
106b4(tsa): 'khor ba la yang 'khor ba med// ma lus bzhes te dgyes mdzod la// 'khor ba'i khri mun stongs par mdzod// de nas gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa
106b5(tsa): 'bul ba 'di skad do// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor grangs bris te// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bsgoms
106b6(tsa): nas/ bde gshegs mchod dbul bzhugs pa rnams// gnyis med yongs kyi sbyor ba yis// dam tshig thugs kyis sor skongs te// gnyis su med par mchod
106b7(tsa): par dbul// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis su 'phags pa cang mi gsung // dbyer med rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir// gnyis su med par mchod par ba zhes
107a1(tsa): su gsol// nyon mongs la sogs dug lnga rnams// thabs mkhas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de// thabs dang shes rab rol pa las//
107a2(tsa): gnyis su med par bzhes su gsol// mi mnyam 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bcil du gsol// de nas mnyam par gzhag pa'i mchod par dbul ba de 'di
107a3(tsa): skad do// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid sangs rgyas pa'i// nga rtog mtshan ma'i spyod yul ngang gis med// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma kun las 'das pa yi// mnyam pa
107a4(tsa): chen po'i mchod par rnam par rol// log rtog sgyu mar snang ba'i sems can dang // ye shes sgyu mar snang ba'i sangs rgyas gnyis// ye shes log rtog khyad par bsam
107a5(tsa): las kyang // sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin yongs kyi mnyam// mnyam pa chen po'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// rnam par rtog med dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku//
107a6(tsa): nga rgya la nyon mongs dug lngar rang 'thad kyang // don rtogs gsol ba'i skyes bus gnyis su med// mnyam pa chen po'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// rig dang ma rig sgyu
107a7(tsa): ma'i khyad par las// lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang nyid btsal ba med// gnyis med don gyi ngang du gcig pa'i phyir// mnyam par bzhag pa'i mchod par bzhes su gsol/
107b1(tsa): de nas lhun gyis grub pa'i mchod pa 'di skad do// phung po lnga yi dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgya chen por lhun gyis grub// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du// thams cad ma
107b2(tsa): lus lhun gyis grub// bro gar 'du 'phro la sogs pas// 'dzul lam mkha' la 'gro ba dang // gar yang thogs pa med pa yi// mkha' 'gro chen por lhun gyis grub//
107b3(tsa): sgra ru grags pa ji snyed pa// tshig dang yi ge thams cad las// gsung gi phyag rgyar lhun gyis grub// bza' btung longs spyod thams cad kyis// sku dang bdud rtsi thams
107b4(tsa): cad 'grub// chos nyid lham me lhan ner gsal// bde chen rgyal po lhun gyis grub// lhun grub mthar phyin mchod par bzhes// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs par
107b5(tsa): mdzod/ tshogs rgyud chen po las/ phyi gzugs kyi mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas nang sgrol ba'i mchod pa la don rnam pa lnga ste/
107b6(tsa): dang po bsgral ba'i rgyu dang / de'i dgongs pa dang // de'i 'phrin las dang / thugs dam bskul ba dang / zhal du bstab pa'o// dang po bsgral ba'i rgyu la
107b7(tsa): yang don rnam pa lnga ste/ gang bsgral pa dang / gang gis bsgral ba dang / gang du bsgral ba dang / don byed ci'i phyir bsgral ba dang / bsgral ba'i yon tan dang / ma bsgral
108a1(tsa): ba'i skyon no// // de la gang bsgral na/ zhing bcur gyur pa 'di bsgral te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgrar gyur pa dang / ngan pa'i
108a2(tsa): tshul can la sogs pa de bsgral lo// de gang gis bsgral na/ thabs mkhas pa'i skyes bu chen pos/ lha'i dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par bsgral
108a3(tsa): lo// dgang du bsgral na/ 'og min chos kyi pho brang yum gyi mkha' la bsgral lo// don ched ci'i phyir bsgral ce na/ mnar med par ltung
108a4(tsa): nges pas// de mtho ris su gdon pa'i ched du thugs rje chen pos bsgral lo// de ma bsgral ba'i skyon ni/ rdo rje theg pa'i bka' 'jig cing // rnal 'byor
108a5(tsa): gyi chos spyod nub nas rgyal khams yongs su phung ba'i skyon yod do// de bsgral ba'i dgongs pa ni/ bdag nyid phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du gsal bar
108a6(tsa): byas pas/ dkyil 'khor chen po drangs te 'khor ba zhes bya ba'i rgya gag byas la/ dang po yi ge raM dang / yaM dang / kha gyis bsreg sbyang tshul bzhin byas nas/
108a7(tsa): dang po mtshon cha rnam pa lnga'i char phab ste/ tsakra oM/ zhes brjod pas/ 'khor lo spyi gtsug tu brgya pa pas/ gti mug gnas su bcom/ badz+ra hUM phaT/ ces brjod
108b1(tsa): bas/ rdo rje snying kar brgyab pas/ zhe sdang gnas su dag par bcom/ rang na swa bruM/ zhes brjod pas/ rin chen lte ba la brgyab pas/ nga rgyal gnas su dag
108b2(tsa): par bcom/ pad+ma ya oM bru/ zhes brjod pas/ pad+ma lte ba la brgyab pas/ 'dod chags gnas su dag par bcom/ tig s+t+ra karma ha/ zhes brjod pas/
108b3(tsa): ral gri rkang ma thil du brgyab pas// phrag dog gnas su dag par bcom// rnam par shes pa sems yi ge hUM du bsgyur/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stengs su gzhag
108b4(tsa): 'og yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bteg/ yab yum sbyor mtshams su 'phangs// sgal tshig gsang ba'i rta brgyud byang chub sems dang 'dres te/ rig
108b5(tsa): pa nges sras su bskyed/ oM AHhUM gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs// slar 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i phyir/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis kha bcad de/ bcag pa ni dgongs
108b6(tsa): pa'o// de'i 'phrin las ni// sems can khyod kyi spyi bo na// yi ge a gcig yod pa ni// lha yi 'chi 'pho la ma yin te// lha yi gnas su
108b7(tsa): khyod mi gtang // a las oM dkar 'od ldan bsgom// oM las rnam par snang mdzad sku// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan bsgoms na// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur//
109a1(tsa): kun tu bzang po'i zhal nas gsungs// sems can khyod kyi lce stengs na// yi ge pre gcig gnas pa ni// yi dgas bkres skom lam
109a2(tsa): yin te/ bkres skom gnas su khyod mi gtang // pre las aM dmar 'od ldan bsgom// aM las snang ba mtha' yas sku// phyag rgya bzhi ldan bsgom byas na// khyod
109a3(tsa): ni rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// sems can khyod kyi snying ka na// yi ge ni gcig gnas pa ni// nr-i ni mi yi sdug bsngal lam// sdug bsngal gnas su khyod mi gtang //
109a4(tsa): nr-i las hUM mthing 'od ldan bsgom// hU las rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan bsgoms na// khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras yin no// sems can khyod kyi lte
109a5(tsa): ba la/ yi ge tri gcig gnas pa ni// byol song blun shing gti mug la ma// gti mug gnas su khyod mi gtang // tri las swa ser 'od ldan bsgom// swa las rin
109a6(tsa): chen 'byung ldan sku// phyag rgya bzhi ldan gsal byas na// khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// sems can khyod kyi gsang ba na// yi ge du gcig gnas pa ni//
109a7(tsa): dmyal ba btso bsreg lam yin te// btso bsreg gnas su khyod mi gtang // du yi steng du ha gcig bsgoms// du las ha ljang 'od ldan pas// cho ga rnam gsum
109b1(tsa): 'phro 'du las// don yod grub pa rgyal ba'i sku// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bsgoms// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas
109b2(tsa): gsungs// 'dis kyang spor ba'i las mdzod cig/ gzhan yang 'phrin las rnam bzhi dang // brtul zhugs chen po'i mchog rnams kyis// smor dang spar ba'i las
109b3(tsa): mdzod cig/ de nas thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul ba 'di skad do// hUM/ rdo rje khro rgyal dpal chen he rA ka/ ngan rtortag khro tshul zhe sdang mi mnga' yang /
109b4(tsa): gtum khro gdug pa ma lus gdul ba'i phyir// thugs rje chen pos bsgral ba'i 'phrin las mdzad// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la mchod mdzad pa'i// sgeg mo
109b5(tsa): rin chen 'phreng thogs dbyangs dang gar// spos kyi sbyin mchog me tog mar me dri// hUM mdzad dz+wal de ste bzhes su gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen badz+ra herA la/
109b6(tsa): bsgral ba'i rnam par shes pa mchod par 'bul// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ thugs kyi dngos grub dus 'dir stsal du gsol// bcom ldan
109b7(tsa): dpal chen bu b+he he ru la// bsgral ba'i gzugs kyi phung po mchod par 'bul// de bzhin rigs kyi thugs dam gongs gyur cig/ sku yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsal du
110a1(tsa): gsol/ bcom ldan dpal chen rang na he ru la// bsgral ba'i tshor ba'i phung po mchod par 'bul// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam skongs
110a2(tsa): gyur cig/ yon tan dngos grub dus 'dir sku la du gsol/ bcom ldan dpal chen pad+ma he ru la// bsgral ba'i 'du shes phung po mchod par 'bu la// pad+ma
110a3(tsa): rigs kyi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ gsung gi dngos grub dus 'dir sku la du gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen karma he ru la// bsgral ba'i 'du byed phung po mche/
110a4(tsa): par 'bul// las kyi rigs kyi thugs dam skongs gyur cig/ 'phrin las dngos grub dus 'dir stsal du gsol// yum chen badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri la// bsgral ba'i
110a5(tsa): bkrag dang mdangs kyi mchod pa 'bu la// rdo rje dbyings phyug thug dam skongs gyur nas// mkha' la dbyings phyug dngos grub stsal du gsol// yum chen bud+d+ha kro d+hi shA
110a6(tsa): ri la// bsgral ba'i sha dang rus pa mchod par 'bul// bud+d+ha yum chen thugs dam skongs gyur nas// bud+d+ha dbyings phyug dngos grub stu la du gsol// yum che na ra tA kro
110a7(tsa): d+hi shwa ri la// bsgral ba'i khrag dang chu yi mchod pa 'bul// rat+na kro d+hi'i thugs dam skongs gyur nas// rin chen dbyings phyug dngos grub stsa la du gsol// yum chen
110b1(tsa): pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri la// bsgra la ba'i drod dang me yi mchod pa 'bu la// pad+ma yum chen thugs dam skongs gyur nas// pad+ma dbyings phyag dngos grub stu la du gsol//
110b2(tsa): yun chen karma kro d+hi shwa ri la// bsgral ba'i dbugs dang rlung gi mchod pa 'bu la// karma kro d+hi'i thugs ngam skongs gyur nas// las kyi dbyings phyug dngos grub sku la
110b3(tsa): du gsol// ke'u ri la sogs khro mo brgyad rnams la// bsgral ba'i rnam shes brgyad kyi mchod pa 'bul// khro mo brgyad ni thugs dam skongs gyur nas// rtogs pa
110b4(tsa): brgyad kyi dngos grub skul du gsol// sing ha la sogs 'phra men brgyad rnams la// bsgral ba'i dur khrod brgyad kyi mchod pa 'bul// mgo brnyan brgyad kyi thugs
110b5(tsa): dam skongs gyur nas// grub pa'i gnas brgyad dngos grub sA la du gsol// rta gdong la sogs sgo ma bzhi rnams la// bsgral ba'i yan lag bzhi yi mchod pa 'bul/
110b6(tsa): sgo ma bzhi yi thugs dam skongs gyur nas// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// dbang phyug khrag 'thung nyi shu brgyad rnams la// bsgral ba'i skal
110b7(tsa): tshigs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi mchod pa 'bul// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad thugs dam skongs gyur nas// las bco la 'bras bu mchis pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol//
111a1(tsa): ma bdun srid bzhi gsang ba'i yum chen la// bsgral ba'i glo snying nang khrol pho mchin dang // mkhris pa mkhal ma la sogs mchod par 'bul//
111a2(tsa): thugs dam gnyen skongs dngos grub stsal du gsol// mi mo pho nya sum brgya drug cu la// bsgral ba'i rus dum sum brgya drug cu rnams// pho nya'i tshogs la mchod 'bul
111a3(tsa): thugs dam skongs// phonya rkang mgyogs dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje kaM dang ging mchog bco brgyad la/ bsgral ba'i rtsib ma bcwo brgyad mchod par 'bul//
111a4(tsa): gling chen thugs ngam skongs te dngos grub stsol// de nas zhal du bstabs pa 'di skad do// bstabs so kha ram zhal phye zhig/ 'bar ba chen po zhal
111a5(tsa): phye zhig/ rnam rtog ma lus zhal du bstabs// dbu dang phyag mangs zhal phye zhig/ dgra bgegs ma lus zhal du bstabs// zhing gsol chas brgyad zhal phye//
111a6(tsa): zhig/ bar du gcod pa zhal du bstabs// sha zan khrag 'thung zhal phye zhig/ bsgral ba'i zhing bcu zhal du bstabs// rnga ma chen ma lus zhal phye zhig/
111a7(tsa): bdud dang srin po zhal du bstabs// mgyogs byed la sogs zhal phye zhig/ dam nyams dgra bgegs zhal du bstabs// 'dzin byed la sogs zhal phye zhig
111b1(tsa): dngos grub par chod zhal du bstabs// bka' nyan la sogs zhal phye zhig/ bstan pa gnyen po 'jig pa dang // dkyil 'khor gnyan po dral ba dang // bsgrub la
111b2(tsa): bar chad byed pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon sku dgra rnams// ma lus pa zhes te rol par mdzod// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// 'dod chags mchod pa pra
111b3(tsa): na med// 'dod chags mchod pa 'di bzhes la// gsung gi dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'byung po'i rus pa mar bas zhim// zhe sdang mchod pa bla na med//
111b4(tsa): zhe sdang mchod pa 'di bzhes la// thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// 'byung po'i sha ni zan byas zhim// gti mug mchod pa bla na med// gti mug mchod
111b5(tsa): pa 'di bzhes la// sku yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA a mr-i ta/ ma hA keng ni rI/ kha ra mA khA hi khA hi/ tshogs rgyud chen po las/ nang sprul
111b6(tsa): ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gsang ba thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyi mchod pa la yang do ni rnam pa lnga ste/ gzungs ma
111b7(tsa): byin gyis brlab pa dang / gnyis su med par sbyar ba dang / gsang ba'i mkha' la sems can thams cad gnas spar te dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha la byang
112a1(tsa): nub sems kyis mchod pa dang / byang chub sems la rdo rje tshe'i dngos grub blang ba'o// de la dang po gzungs ma byin gyis
112a2(tsa): brlab pa ni// gzungs ma nyid yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin du// dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i pho brang bzhugs gnas gzhal med khang du byin
112a3(tsa): gyis brlabs la/ gsang ba'i mkha' la dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshang bar bsgom pa dang / gnas lngar yi ge dpa' bo 'bru lnga las rigs lngar bsgyur ba dang / gsang ba'i
112a4(tsa): yum bzhis bskor bar bsgoms la byin gyis brlab bo// de nas gnyis su med par sbyor ba ni/ dang po spyan gyi brda zhig mdzad de/ 'dis sku la
112a5(tsa): lo// mtshan mchog brgyan pa'i yum mchog shes rab spyan// shes rab don gyi rgyal ba'i thugs dmo bskul// mi dmigs snying rjes thams cad yongs la
112a6(tsa): snyoms/ thubs dang shes rab tshul gyis sa ma ya s+thA ma// zhes bskul ba dang / yum gyis yab la 'di skad ces bskul lo// thabs la mkhas pas 'gro
112a7(tsa): pa 'dren pa'i gtso// 'khor ba ma spangs gnas su dag pa las// 'phags pa rnams la dgyes pa'i thugs dam bskul// bde ba chen po rgyan du mchod
112b1(tsa): par bzhes// sa ma ya hUM/ zhes bskul bas/ yab kyis phyag rgya chen po bzhis mnyam par sbyar/ hUM las gsang ba rdo rje rtse lngar bsgoms nas/
112b2(tsa): rje'i rwa lnga la rigs lnga'i snying po bkod/ yum gyi mkha' la paM las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la yum lnga'i snying po bkod// pra be sha phaT kyis sgo dbye/ su ra ta
112b3(tsa): stam/ zhes bskul bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dgyes pa dus gcig tu bstar te/ mnyes pa chen pos thugs dam bskongs/ don dbying
112b4(tsa): dang ye shes// rtags thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub bo// de nas gsang ba'i mkha' la sems can thams cad gnas
112b5(tsa): spar te dbyung bskur ba ni// nam mkha' gang nas gang du khyab par chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab la/ chos kyi dbyings kyis gang nas gang du khyab par/ yum gyi
112b6(tsa): mkha'i klong rnam par dag pas khyab par/ snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad yum gyi mkha' dbyings rnam par dag par rang gzhal yas khang du gyur pa'i gnas na/
112b7(tsa): mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems me mar rlung gis ma bskyed pa 'dra ba la gnas pa las/ kun gzhi a'i rang bzhin dang / yi dam hUM gi rang
113a1(tsa): bzhin du bsdus te/ yum gyi mkha' la gnas spur te/ yab yum gyi 'od bsnol mar bstims pas/ a dang / hUM dang / byang chub
113a2(tsa): sems gsum 'dres pa las/ thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sras su gyur te/ sems can thams cad rgyal ba'i sras zhes dkyil 'khor gyi lha
113a3(tsa): rnams kyis kyang rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur te/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'dzin par byang chub kyi sems kyi dbang byin te gzhag go// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud las// byang
113a4(tsa): chub sems kyi dbang byin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dbul ba ni/ me long rang
113a5(tsa): yu can gyi nang du gzhag la/ srin mtheb kyi phyag rgyas gtso bo dang 'khor yan chad la mchod pa phul bas dgyes pa chen po'i bdud rtsis mnyes nas/ dngos
113a6(tsa): grub stsol zhing byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems las rdo rje che'i dngos grub blang ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad
113a7(tsa): yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang chub kyi sems kun dkar tsa ra ra 'dzags pas/ bdag gi byang chub sems dang 'dres te lce la blangs
113b1(tsa): byas/ tsit+tA la thim pas/ ye shes sems dpa'i sku mtshon gang bar gyur te/ skye 'chi med pa'i g.yung drung du gyur te byang chub sems kyi sid+d+hi thob pa'o//
113b2(tsa): tshogs kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / tshogs rgyud chen po las// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// /
113b3(tsa): de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa'i grangs ni// rab kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dbul bar gsungs so// 'bring gis dus bzhir dbul bar bya'o//
113b4(tsa): thams nyin lanA ra mtshan lan re dbul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyad thengs re zhing grol thengs re dang / smin pa'i mchog rI re 'grub par gsungs
113b5(tsa): so// de la tshogs kyi mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni// rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa ltar dka' ba da ltar spyad nas 'bras bu phyis 'ong du re ba ma yin te/ tshogs kyi 'bras
113b6(tsa): bu ni yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa las bcur rim gyis bgrod mi dgos te/ da ltar nyid nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//
113b7(tsa): de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni// phung po mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rigs 'dzin
114a1(tsa): sa la bde bar gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun mnyes te// byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur te// dngos grub dam pa stsol
114a2(tsa): bar mdzad// chos kyi sku dang gnyis su med// ces sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs so// de la tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di yun ci tsam gyis 'grub
114a3(tsa): ce na/ rab kyis zla ba gcig gis 'grub// 'bring ni lo gcig dag gis 'grub// tha mas lo gsum tshun chad du// tshogs kyi mchod pa phul byas nA/
114a4(tsa): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring // zhes gsungs so// de la tshogs phul ba'i yon tan ni/ 'jig rten
114a5(tsa): gyi khams 'dir yang / rgyal ba'i sras dang bcas pa'i zhal mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ma mo dang mkha' 'gro thams cad sprin spungs bzhin du gtibs te/
114a6(tsa): ci bsgo ba'i bka' nyan cing // dngos grub kyi stongs dang grogs byed cing / mthu dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par dbang byin te/ thams cad du bde skyid
114a7(tsa): phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / longs spyod thams cad 'phel ba dang / 'khor thams cad 'du zhing nad dang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
114b1(tsa): lha ma srin thams cad kyis kyang gnyen zhing byin che bar mthong ba dang // de la gar gyi dbang phyug ltar len pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis kyang mig gi 'bras bu
114b2(tsa): ltar mthong ste/ yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten phyi mar rigs 'dzin thams cad kyis mdun bsu ste/ lcang lo can gyi gnas su phyin par
114b3(tsa): 'gyur ro// tshogs ma phul ba'i skyon ni/ bsgrubs kyang don med cing bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyang zhal 'dzum pa mi mdzad cing // bsod
114b4(tsa): nams dang skal ba'i shas chung ste/ dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song gi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po las/ skyon
114b5(tsa): dang yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs rgyud chen po rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// /
114b6(tsa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ de lta bu'i tshogs rgyud chen po 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang du snang bar 'gyur// sems can rnams
114b7(tsa): la ji ltar phan par 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rnam 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di
115a1(tsa): ni 'dod khams dang / gzugs khams dang / gzugs med pa'i rigs thams cad du khyab par 'gyur ro// dang po 'og min gyi
115a2(tsa): gnas su ting nge 'dzin gyi pU tsa'i mchod pa las rgyu blang ste/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ thams cad chos kyi skur sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro//
115a3(tsa): de nas gzugs khams kyi lha tshogs su tshogs sbyor gyi tshogs 'dis khyab pas// dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyis rgyu byas te/ lha'i longs sprod rnam
115a4(tsa): pa sna tshogs pa las gzhi blangs te/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byam 'khor dang bcas pa la/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po phul bas// lha'i rigs
115a5(tsa): 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ phung po mi gnas par mya ngan las 'das pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byed do// de nas drang srong rnams
115a6(tsa): kyi rigs su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud 'dis khyab pas// drang srong rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pas// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la
115a7(tsa): mchod pa phul bas/ drang srong la sogs pa rims kyis phung po lhag ma med pa'i mi gnas par mya ngan las 'das par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byed
115b1(tsa): do// de nas klu'i rigs su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab pas/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa
115b2(tsa): klu'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod kyis// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa ma lus pa la rnal 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ klu'i rigs 'bum
115b3(tsa): phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa lus ma bor bar// mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las ma 'das par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas
115b4(tsa): mi'i rigs su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab na yang / mi gnas pa'i snod du gyur pa yang rig pa cha phra mo yod pa dang / sprul pa'i sku la gnas pa
115b5(tsa): dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dad pa dang / rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / mgo ru dang / sha ru dang / bstan pa 'jam dang / khyim bdag gi ris su/ las
115b6(tsa): kyi 'phro can la sogs pa rnams kyis dang du blangs te/ rgyal srid dang / longs spyod dang / grogs mchog tu bcas te rab tu bde ba'i gnas su/ gsang ba'i
115b7(tsa): dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor rgyal po rgya mtsho dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po phul te/
116a1(tsa): 'phags pa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ste/ chom bu grangs brgya dang stong la sogs pa dang / pho mo rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa lus
116a2(tsa): ma bor bar tshe 'di nyid la/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// rgyu de la rten nas
116a3(tsa): dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i sgo bkag ste/ rim kyis bla na med pa'i sa la phyin par 'gyur ro// rgyu de lam la 'god par byed do//
116a4(tsa): gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas te dmyal bar ltung nges pa yang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'di gzhung bzhin du phul na/ mnar
116a5(tsa): med pa'i gnas su mi ltung ste/ bde ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams pa yang gzhan gyis mi bskodas
116a6(tsa): te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'dis skongs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig gzhan la phan 'dogs par 'dod na yang / las gzhan gyis mi
116a7(tsa): 'grub ste/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po phul nas gang phan gdags pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang zhig bar du gcod pa sgrol bar 'dod na
116b1(tsa): yang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'di phul na yid la bsam pa bzhin sgrol bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig 'jig rten 'di'i bde ba dang // mthu
116b2(tsa): dbang phun sum tshogs par 'dod na yang / rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs kyi mchod pa 'dri gzhung bzhin du phul na glang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i rnal
116b3(tsa): 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di yang snod ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang can dang / dam tshig la mi gnas pa dang / ngan sems can dang / 'dod rgyal ba rnams ni ma gtogs/
116b4(tsa): so// de nas sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa// rim kyis thams cad bla na med par 'grub pa lags na/ mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis
116b5(tsa): mthar rdzogs par spyod par 'gyur ba lags sam/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis// rim kyis tshom bu mang
116b6(tsa): po sangs rgyas par byed na yang // kun gyi thun mong du ma gsungs te/ dper na til mar gyis rdzas gang la phog kyang sra zhing mkhregs par 'gyur na/ ardza ga'i dog po
116b7(tsa): la phog na tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ dam la mi gnas shing gsang sngags tshig tsam la khungs phyung nas/ khe dang / grags pa dang / phrag dog dang /
117a1(tsa): nyon mongs pa rang rgyud du spyod pa rnams kyis spyad kyang // slar nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di mi'i 'jig
117a2(tsa): rten thams cad du khyab na yang // phal cher lta ba dang mi ldan par 'byor pa sna tshogs kyis mchod cing 'bul bar byed na yang // don med pa ni ma yin// 'byor pa'i tshogs
117a3(tsa): rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs bskyed pa las// 'di nyid du mngon par sangs rgyas pa yang 'byung ngo // phal cher khungs phyung tsam dang 'byor pa ma
117a4(tsa): tshogs par 'bul ba dag yod na/ dmigs pa'i phan stobs tsam du 'gyur ba yang yod do// gang zhig dgongs pa lhun gyis grub cing lta ba dang man ngag tu ldan pas/
117a5(tsa): dus gsum du 'phags pa'i tshogs la// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod phul ba lta ci smos kyis// slob dpon de nyid kyi karma ra yang dro zhal gcig tsam drangs pa yang
117a6(tsa): rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod phul ba dang 'dra bar skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi rang bzhin no// de lta bu'i
117a7(tsa): rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du mtha' yas par spyod par 'gyur la/ mi'i 'jig rten na yang bskal pa bzang po dang dus
117b1(tsa): dang po la ni rgya gar yul la sogs pa dang / yul gyi dbus dang / khrims dang gtsug lag la gnas pa'i rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi rigs la
117b2(tsa): sogs pa rnams kyis rgyu sbyar nas/ gu ru mahA la sogs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas bshad cing bsgo la bsrung zhing ma nyams par byas nas//
117b3(tsa): 'ga' dang 'ga' tsam las phal cher mi spro ste/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgo nas mthar phyin cing mngon du grub par 'gyur ro// bskal ba
117b4(tsa): dang dus par ma la rgyal khams ris phal cher grags te// rigs pa'i sa thob pa dang // rgyud kyi don la mkhas pa dang / man ngag dang snod dbang tshul bzhin
117b5(tsa): du thob par byas nas/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i mi mo dang / gzhung dang mthun pa'i sbyor ba dang / dad pa dang ldan pa'i sa ri ha dang / khrims dang ldan pa'i rgyal
117b6(tsa): po dang / blon po la sogs pa grangs kyi tshoms bsdus te bshad cing bstan pa dang // rtog pa dkrol zhing 'khu 'phrig dang the tsom ma zos par byas te//
117b7(tsa): yid ches shing dad pa la skyo du ba med par byas te/ phel cher dam la btags te/ gnas dben pa dang / 'gol bar skye bo dang / mi nag yongs kyis ma 'grims
118a1(tsa): pas/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol nas// dus gsum 'phags pa'i tshogs la rnal 'byor tshogs kyi sa la mchod
118a2(tsa): pa chen po gzhung bzhin du phul na// 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i don dus gcig tu 'grub ste/ gzugs mi yul nas ma 'phags par sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa
118a3(tsa): dang yongs kyis gsang sngags mnyan zhing // spyod pa blangs po ma 'phrogs te/ ya ka dang sgro skur med cing gsang ba'i bka' thabs kyis spyod par 'gyur ro//
118a4(tsa): bskal pa tha ma dang dus tha ma la ni gang zag gi tha dad dang // rgyal po'i bka' khrims nyams pas mi smad rims nas dbang che ba dang / blon po ma byang
118a5(tsa): bas so kha nang du ltas pa dang / rnal 'byor pa ma grol bas bsrung mtshams las 'das shing // gsang sngags 'chol ba'i dbang gis// thang khob pa dang /
118a6(tsa): gda' mdo dang / kla klo dang // rtsi ra sa'i grong thams cad du brdal bas// gsang sngags bka' 'chol// chos ni kun spyod/ chos bzhin du gang yang mi byed//
118a7(tsa): chos ni kun la yod par byas// rtogs ni slob dpon rang gis kyang ma rtogs// dam tshig kun nod// bsrung ba gcig kyang mi bsrung // slob dpon ni kun
118b1(tsa): byed/ dbang gang la yang med// lad mo kun zlos// nyams su gang gis kyang ma longs// dbang kun la bskur// chags pa ni gang la yang ma chags//
118b2(tsa): 'chad pa kun 'chad// thog tu gang gis kyang ma phebs// rtsol ni kun rtsol/ mthar gang gis kyang ma phyin pas/ phal cher bgyid lug ste sngags las bzlog
118b3(tsa): pa dang / phal cher ma rtogs pas the tshom za ba dang / phal cher ya ka dang sgro skur 'debs pa mang ba dang / rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs mchod kyi 'byor pa rnams
118b4(tsa): mi 'bul bar// mi'i 'byor pa dang 'du ba med pas// de'i dbang gis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang mnga' thang dang longs spyod bri nas/ mtshams tshad tsam 'bul bar
118b5(tsa): byed pas bsod nams mi thob pa dang / phal cher 'byor pa sna tshogs pa sogs nas 'bul bar byed na yang // gsang ba med pa dang grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir//
118b6(tsa): bdag dus 'di tsam na longs spyod 'di tsam bshams te// tshogs mchod 'bul bar byed do zhes bsgrags pa'i dbang gis btag pa can dang // brnab sems
118b7(tsa): can dang / 'dod sems can dang / nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i skyon dang // mkhas pa rnams mi 'chad par/ mi mkhas pa rnams che 'dod pa'i phyir 'chad
119a1(tsa): bas/ mkhas pa rnams kyis bka' rgyud gsang bya'i man ngag rnams brnags te sbas pas/ bka' nges pa nub pa'i skyon gyis phal cher
119a2(tsa): nyungs par dogs nas rang bzo dang / ke'u shang / bsre bcos dang / mi tshig bsres pas// de la che bar mtshan rtags kyang / rgyud la khungs med pa'i gang zag
119a3(tsa): sbyin du re ba'i rang thad du brgyud pa sa ngal ba'i tshe chad pa dang // las brtsams pa gron tshigs su 'gyur zhing // grub pa'i dus ring ba dang // phal cher ra chod dang /
119a4(tsa): ga zu lums dang / rakr-i'i las spyos thabs su byas te snang snang ni sgrol/ 'phrad 'phrang ni sbyor/ rnyed rnyed ni za/ spyod pa 'chol ba'i dbang gis rnal 'byor
119a5(tsa): gyi tshogs mchod du byed na yang / dper na zangs mi gser tu bcos pa dang 'dra ste/ gser gyi dngos po min pa dang 'dra'o// phal cher bdag nyid kyi 'jug sgo dang /
119a6(tsa): thos phyogs dang // mos btsan la 'di ni bzang la don dam pa yin la// gzhan ni ngan pa yin no zhes/ chos nyid phyogs ris med pa la// phyogs dang ris su bcad
119a7(tsa): pa'i skyon dang / 'khor dang / bde ba dang bcas par phye ste/ phrag dog che chung gi dbang gis mnyam pa'i don la 'gal bar gnas pa dang / phal cher theg pa'i
119b1(tsa): ris so sor bzung ste/ rtsod pa'i chos bshom pa'i dus na ni// kun gyis 'bras bu bla na med pa mi thob par ngan song gsum po sha stag tu ltung ba dang / sngon gyi ston
119b2(tsa): pa'i bka' nub pas/ ming tshig 'phel bas bsgrub thag ring ba dang / dam tshig la zer shor bas bsam pa mi 'grub cing bar chad kyi rkyen 'byung ba dang / dbang
119b3(tsa): brgyud rims kyis mi bskur bas mthu byin chung ba dang / bsgom bsgrub kyi don mthil du ma 'phebs pas drod tshad la ma bab pa dang / shes pa'i rgyud ma grol bas rtogs
119b4(tsa): pa ma shar ba dang / mchod rdzas ma 'tshogs shing phud nyams pas dngos grub mi thob pa dang / las dang man ngag rdeng du ma chud pas bar chod 'byung ba'i dus na yang /
119b5(tsa): rnal 'byor pa 'ga' dang 'ga' zhig gi rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di ltar spyod cing // dang du len nus pa rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' dang skal
119b6(tsa): ba mnyam par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i tshogs rgyud chen po las// bca' lugs dang skyon yon gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas sems
119b7(tsa): dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ de lta bu'i tshogs rgyud 'di la dam tshig gang lags/ dbang gang lags/ lta ba gang lags/ bsgrub pa gang lags/ spyod
120a1(tsa): ba gang lags/ lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
120a2(tsa): pa/ de dag zhus pa legs so legs so// de la tshogs kyi dam tshig ni/ slob dpon ni bdag gi srog dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srog bcud na
120a3(tsa): 'chi la/ srog ma bcad na mi 'chi brtan zhing // 'jig rten gyi bde ba rims kyis thob pa dang 'dra bar/ slob dpon dang 'thabs pa dang smod pa lta ci smos
120a4(tsa): kyis spang ba 'am bral na yang dge ba'i bar chad cing man ngag mi thob pas/ dper na srog dang 'dra bar lta ba dang / rgyal theb dang karma la sogs kyang /
120a5(tsa): dpe mig dang dbang po ltar lta ste/ dper na mig dang dbang po nyams pa dang med pa lta ci smos kyi/ bag tsam gzer ba yang mi bzod pa dang 'dra bar rgyal theb
120a6(tsa): karma ging la 'thab rtso ci smos kyis// bag tsam ma dad pa skyes na yang sgrib pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / mched dang lcam dral yan lag dang phung po dang 'dra ste/
120a7(tsa): gang snang bas kun g.yo zhing sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba dang 'dra ba dang / sku'i gnod pa tshabs po che lta ci smos kyi/ 'gal 'khrul tsam byung na yang /
120b1(tsa): yongs mi bde zhing nyams pa'i chad par 'gyur bas/ sku'i dam tshig bsrung zhing rtse gdung byas la dad pa cher bskyed la yangs par bya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya
120b2(tsa): dgongs pa gsum ni// dper na gtam dang / zas dang / gos ltar te/ phyi nang gtam gyis ma 'jal na gang yang mi 'grub la/ 'tsho ba zas kyis ma gsos
120b3(tsa): na phung po mi theg/ dro ba gos ma gon na nyon mongs pa dang 'dra bar// snying po dang sngags ma bgrangs na grub pa'i rtags mi yong/ dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma spang na
120b4(tsa): shes pa'i rgyud mi grol// phyag rgya dam du ma bcas na nyon mongs pa dang phung po gnas mi 'gyur ba sa/ dam du bcas te dang du blang ngo // thugs kyi dam tshig ni
120b5(tsa): gter sba ba dang 'dra ste/ dper na rin po che gter sgrom du sbas na 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med cing // sgrom kha phye na dga' ba bskyed cing // 'dod pa phun sum tshogs
120b6(tsa): par byed pa dang 'dra bar/ gsang ba'i man ngag thams cad snod ma yin pa la sbas te bdag gi blo la btags na rtogs pa mngon du gyur nas/ 'bras bu mthar phyin
120b7(tsa): par 'gyur bas gter dang 'dra bar sba bar dam tshig bca' 'o// gtan mi 'byung ba ni ma yin te/ gter la bdag dang bu spyod pa dang 'dra bar/ gsang ba'i man
121a1(tsa): ngag bdug dang bu dang 'dra ba la ma gtogs pa/ bshad pa'i grangs bzhi las mangs na 'gal bar gsungs so// dus
121a2(tsa): tha ma la bab pa'i tshe/ rtsa ba 'di rnams nos nas gang yang mi bsrung ste/ sku'i dam tshig nyams te 'thab rtsod shor ba dang / gsung yang nyams te sngags dang /
121a3(tsa): phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin spangs te/ mdo sde bsam gtan gyi phul kyang ba zhes su don spyod pa dang / thugs kyang nyams te brgya dang nyi shu la bshad pa ni 'bras
121a4(tsa): bu mnar med pa lta ci smos kyis/ dper na seng ge'i khog pa nang gis nang 'jig pa bzhin// chos nyan du gang zag sngags pa rang gis ma ster te/ rang gis rang
121a5(tsa): smras so// rtsa ba'i dam tshig ma nyams na yan lag ljon shing dang 'dra ste/ skye bas nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / brgya rtsa brgyad dang / sum brgya drug cu dang / sam
121a6(tsa): ya stong 'bum sde la sogs pa'i gang spyod pa'i yan lag lo 'dab dang 'dra bas 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig 'di dag nyams par gyur na tshigs kyi mchod
121a7(tsa): pa dang / longs spyod rdzas su phul kyang bzhes su mig nang zhing mnyes par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de las bsod nams med cing 'bras bu mi thob pa'i
121b1(tsa): phyir ro// tshogs rgyud chen po las// dam tshig nyams pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de la tshogs rgyud chen po 'di la dbang rnam pa lnga ste/
121b2(tsa): chos dang rgyud 'chad cing nyan pa'i dbang dang / yi dam gyi lha bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang dang / dkyil 'khor gnyan po zhal lta ba'i dbang dang / tshogs
121b3(tsa): kyi zhal zas 'tshal zhing longs spyod pa'i dbang dang / las kyi rdo rje las gang byed par ming gi dbang bskur ba dang lnga'o// de la d+harma tAn+ta nyan
121b4(tsa): cing 'chad pa'i dbang ni 'di skad do// gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog rnams// ston pas nges par gsungs pa'i don// nyan cing yid la 'dzin
121b5(tsa): pa dang / ma 'dres ston pa'i dbang tho ba shog/ de nas yi dam gyi lha bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// bskal pa grangs
121b6(tsa): med sngon rol nas// bsgoms shing bsgrubs pa'i yi dam lha// me tog dbang gis phog pa 'di// bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/
121b7(tsa): de nas dkyil 'khor gnyan po zhal lte ba'i dbang la 'di skad do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// dur khrod 'bar ba'i rdzas bkram
122a1(tsa): nas/ sku gsung thugs su gsal sgom pa// lta zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang thob shogade nas tshogs kyi zhal zas
122a2(tsa): la 'tshal zhing longs spyod pa'i dbang 'di skad do// rgyal ba mchod pas dam skong zhing // mchod pa phul bas bgegs zhi nas// pham phabs longs spyod
122a3(tsa): bdud rtsi'i bcud// rnal 'byor tshogs la longs spyod shog/ de nas las kyi rdo rje las gang byed pa'i ming gi dbang bskur ba 'di skad do//
122a4(tsa): zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // 'phrin las drag dal gang byed pa'i// las rnams che ge byed pa por// rdo rje ming gi dbang thob shog/ tshogs rgyud
122a5(tsa): chen po las/ dbang gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas tshogs kyi lta ba la don rnam pa lngas bstan te/ tshogs pa thams cad dkyil
122a6(tsa): 'khor du lta ba dang / 'byor pa thams cad longs spyod du lta ba dang / mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba dang / dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba dang //
122a7(tsa): rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du lta ba'o// de la tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du lta ba ni/ rdo rje slob dpon dang / mched dang lcam
122b1(tsa): dral tshogs pa yang // rdo rje slob dpon ni dkyil yin la/ mched dang lcam dral ni 'khor yin par lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad dgongs spyod rgya
122b2(tsa): mtsho'i glong gi dkyil 'khor du rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'o// dam rdzas tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor te/ byang chub sems ni dkyil yin la/ dam
122b3(tsa): rdzas gzhan ni 'khor yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bde ba chen po'i don la skye 'chi med pa'i dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'o// dam rdzas dang lag cha tshogs
122b4(tsa): pa thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor te/ ban+d+ha dkyil yin la// dur khrod kyi chas ni 'khor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i rol pa chen pos// rnam
122b5(tsa): par rtog pa thams cad chos nyid du lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin no// de la 'byor pa thams cad longs spyod du lta ba dang / phyi
122b6(tsa): snod kyi 'jig rten dang nang bcud kyi 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi longs spyod du byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus su// byol song
122b7(tsa): thams cad kyis lus tshogs su phul ba dang / gshin rje thams cad kyis sha chen tshogs su phul ba dang / srin po thams cad kyis thod rus dang 'bru mar tshogs su
123a1(tsa): phul ba dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis dza gang rnam pa sna tshogs tshogs su 'bul ba dang / ma mo dang mkha' 'gros khrag dang snum chen tshogs su
123a2(tsa): phul ba dang / klu rnams kyis snying po sna tshogs 'bu la ba dang / byol song rnams kyi sa 'o ma sna tshogs 'bul ba dang / nam mkha' lding rnams kyis shing tog sna tshogs 'bul
123a3(tsa): ba dang / sman gyi lhas sman sna tshogs 'bul ba dang / rtsi'i lha mos rtsi'i sman sna tshogs 'bul ba dang / mkha' lding gis spos sna tshogs tshogs su 'bul ba dang /
123a4(tsa): sa bdag rnams kyis 'bru sna tshogs tshogs su 'bul pa dang / mi rnams kyis mis sbyar ba'i zhal zas sna tshogs tshogs su 'bul ba dang / lha rnams kyis rin po che
123a5(tsa): chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / lha'i 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro reg longs
123a6(tsa): spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshogs su 'bul ba la sogs pa// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ rnal 'byor tshogs kyi longs spyod chen por byin gyis
123a7(tsa): brlabs te gsol/ gzhan yang 'grangs shing tshim par mdzad/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pas/ 'byor pa thams cad longs spyod du lta'o//
123b1(tsa): de la mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba ni/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes chen po'i ngang las byung ste/ phar mchod pas
123b2(tsa): thugs dam bskul// dngos grub nod// slar 'dus pas sgrib pa sbyangs/ dngos grub tho ba ste/ lha la lha thim/ ye shes la ye shes rol// chos nyid la chos
123b3(tsa): nyid thim// phar mchod pas bdag nyid kyi sems dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes su mnyam zhing dbyer med par mchod pa phul// slar 'dus pas de bzhin
123b4(tsa): gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang / bdag gi sems mnyam zhing dbyer med de/ ye shes mchod pa 'od zer gyi rgyan du bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin byang chub sems kyi
123b5(tsa): dngos po/ rgyal ba'i chos la dang po longs spyod par mdzad pas// mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta'o// dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba ni//
123b6(tsa): mdun gyi nam mkha' las ye shes sems dpa' rgyal ba rgya mtsho sras dang bcas par dmigs pa yang bdag gi phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang // rnam
123b7(tsa): par shes pa nyid lha'i rgyud du snang ba las ma gtogs pa/ gzhan gud na med pa'i rtog pa'i lta bas rtogs par byas la/ ji ltar ga na ma ri dang sa brag thams cad 'byung
124a1(tsa): ba lnga la bsdus la/ skye 'gro thams cad kyang 'byung ba lnga dang phung po lnga bsdus pas 'byung ba dang / phung po thams cad kyang lha dang lha mo'i
124a2(tsa): dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin la/ rtogs pa'i lta bas rtogs par byas la/ mdun dang shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo dang / zhing khams dang
124a3(tsa): pho brang gi rang bzhin// g.yas dang lho thams rad rin chen rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo dang // zhing khams dang / pho brang gi rang bzhin// rgyab dang nub thams cad
124a4(tsa): pad+ma rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo dang / zhing khams dang / pho brang gi rang bzhin// g.yon dang byang thams cad las kyi rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo dang / zhing khams
124a5(tsa): dang / pho brang gi rang bzhin/ steng dang nam mkha' thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo dang / sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang /
124a6(tsa): khro bo dang / khro mo dang // zhing khams dang / pho brang dang / dkyil 'khor dang / lha rgyud kyi rang bzhin du rtogs par byas la/ yid kyis dmigs pas//
124a7(tsa): dmigs pa rnams lha rgyud du lta'o// rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du lta ba ni// phyi nang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad 'byung
124b1(tsa): ba lngas bsdus la/ 'byung ba lnga po nyid yum chen mo lnga'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa chos nyid dbyings kyi rang bzhin pas/ dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das pa'i
124b2(tsa): gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin yin pa las// de ltar ma rtogs na gzhan nas gzhal yas khang gnyan pa ris su chad pa med pas// rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas
124b3(tsa): khang du lta'o// tshogs rgyud chen po las/ lta ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas tshogs kyi bsgrub pa la yang don rnam pa lnga ste/
124b4(tsa): sku'i bsgrub pa dang / gsung gi bsgrub pa dang / thugs kyi bsgrub pa dang / yon tan gyi bsgrub pa dang / 'phrin las kyi bsgrub pa gang byed kyang rung ste/
124b5(tsa): rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi bsgrub pa dgos te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs 'di ni lan tshwa dang cha 'dra ste/ gang la yang mi tshang du mi rung ste/ sku'i bsgrub
124b6(tsa): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la tshogs kyi mchod pa gzhung bzhin phul nas/ sku'i bsgrub pa yang 'grub cing mthar phyin par 'gyur zhing / gsung dang / thugs
124b7(tsa): dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las kyang de bzhin du gang bsgrub pa tshogs kyis bsgrub pa'o// de'i don ni gzhung du ma dag las rgya cher byung ngo // tshogs rgyud chen
125a1(tsa): bau las/ bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas tshogs kyi spyod pa ni don rnam pa gsum ste/ tshogs kyi spyod
125a2(tsa): pa thabs dang shes rab tu spyod pa dang / tshogs kyi spyod pa spong len med par spyod pa dang / tshogs kyi spyod pa 'ching grol med par spyod pa'o// de la tshogs kyi
125a3(tsa): spyod pa thabs dang shes rab tu spyod pa ni/ yo ga phyi ma man chad kyi sgor zhugs pa rnams kyis// tshogs kyi mchod pa lta ci smos kyis/ 'dod pa'i yon tan gang la yang
125a4(tsa): skyon du lta ba'i nang nas kyang / thabs dang shes rab 'ching ba'i bsha la thag tu brtags pa ste/ rdo rje'i theg pa thabs la mkhas pa'i gnas skabs na/ thams cad
125a5(tsa): thabs dang shes rab dbyings dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pa thams cad ma spangs par 'jol tog tu spyod par ma zad de/ chos nyid kyi
125a6(tsa): rgyan du shar bas dga' ba der longs spyod la// de nyid kyis gnyis su med pa chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur ba'o// de la tshogs kyi spyod pa spong len med par spyod
125a7(tsa): pa ni/ yo ga phyi ba man chad kyis 'di gtsang ba'i rigs te 'phags pa mchod pa'i rgyu yin la/ 'di ni mi gtsang ba dang sme ba yin pas/ 'phags pa mchod pa'i rgyu ma yin no//
125b1(tsa): zhes spong len du spyod pa ma yin/ chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin rnam par rtog pa ming yang med pa las/ gtsang ba yang lha'i zhal zas yin la/ mi gtsang ba yang lha'i zhal zas
125b2(tsa): gnyis su med pa'i don de nyid 'phags pa'i dgongs spyod dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i sku 'grub pas/ gang la yang 'di 'khor ba dang mi gtsang ba'i rgyu yin pas spong la/ 'di thar pa
125b3(tsa): dang / bde ba dang / gtsang ba'i rgyu yin zhes dang du mi len te/ spong len med pas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa yin no// tshogs kyi mchod pa 'ching 'grol med
125b4(tsa): par longs spyod pa ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa la yang chags pa med par spyad/ mthar phyin par spyad pas/ 'khor ba dang nyon mongs pas 'ching
125b5(tsa): ba med la/ de nyid rtog pa'i rgyan du rig nas chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin pas/ de ltar spyod na grol ba yang med la/ 'ching ba yang med pa'o// tshogs rgyud chen
125b6(tsa): po las// spyod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ rigs lnga yab yum dang / sems dpa' dang /
125b7(tsa): sems ma dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / sprul pa dang / yang sprul dang / ci bgyi dang / bka' nyan dang / dam la btags pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen
126a1(tsa): po'i tshogs la longs spyod sku nyams su bstar nas/ thams cad gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi skur lhun gyis grub nas bzhugs so// rnal 'byor
126a2(tsa): gyi tshogs rgyud chen po las/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // rdzogs so// // tshogs rgyud chen po rtsa rgyud dang phyi ma
126a3(tsa): 'dri bod du 'gyur ro// gsang ba bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi phug thugs/ sgrub sangs rgyas ye shes rin po ches skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos te/ stong tsha ba 'phags
126a4(tsa): pa rin po che la bshad// // de nas gsang ba thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyi mchod pa la yang don rnam pa lnga ste/
126a5(tsa): gzungs ma byin gyis brlab pa dang / gnyis su med par sbyar ba dang / gsang ba'i mkha' la sems can thams cad gnas sbar te dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor
126a6(tsa): gyi lha la byang chub sems kyi mchod pa 'bul ba dang / byang chub sems rdo rje lce'i dngos grub blang ba dang wA'o// de la dang po gzungs ma byin gyis brlab
126a7(tsa): pa ni/ gzungs ma nyid yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i rang bzhin du/ dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i bzhugs gnas gzhal med khang du byin gyis brlabs la
126b1(tsa): gsang ba'i mkha' la dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshang bar bsgom pa dang / gnas lngar yi ge 'bru lnga las rigs lngar gyur pa dang / gsang ba'i yum bzhis bskor bar bsgoms la
126b2(tsa): byin gyis brlab bo// de nas gnyis su med par sbyar ba ni/ dang po spyan gyi brda zhig mdzad de 'dis bskul lo// mtshan mchog brgyan pa'i yum mchog
126b3(tsa): shes rab spyan// shes rab don gyis rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// mi dmigs snying rje thams cad yongs la snyoms// thabs dang shes rab tshul khrims kyis//
126b4(tsa): sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes bskul ba dang / yum gyis yab la 'di skad ces bskul lo// thabs la mkhas pas 'gro ba 'dren pa'i gtso// 'khor ba spangs nas gnas
126b5(tsa): su dag pa la/ 'phags pa rnams la dgos pa'i thugs dam bskul// bde ba chen po'i mchod pa rgyan du bzhes// sa ma ya hUM/ zhes paskul bas/ yab kyi phyag
126b6(tsa): rgya chen po bzhis mnyam par sbyar/ hUM las gsang ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga par bsgom/ rdo rje'i rwa lnga la rigs lnga'i snying po dgod/ yum gyi mkha' las pad+ma 'dab brgyad
126b7(tsa): la yum gyi snying po dgod/ pra be sha phaT kyis sgo phye/ su ra ta s+t+waM gyis bskul bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dges pa gcig tu bdar te/ mnyes pa chen
127a1(tsa): po thugs dam skongs/ don dbyings dang ye shes/ rtags thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par lhun gyis grub pa'o//
127a2(tsa): de nas gsang ba'i mkha' la sems can thams cad gnas spar te dbang bskur ba ni/ nam mkha' gang dang gang du khyab par/ chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab la/ chos kyi
127a3(tsa): dbyings kyis gang nas gang du khyab par/ yum gyi mkha' klong rnam par dag pas khyab pas/ snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad yum gyi mkha' dbyings rnam par dag
127a4(tsa): pa'i gzhal yas khang du gyur pa'i nang nas mtha' yas sems can thams cad kyi sems mar me rlung gis ma bskyod par gnas pa lta bu las/ kun gzhi a'i rang
127a5(tsa): bzhin dang // yid hUM gi rang bzhin du 'dus te/ yab yum 'od bsnol mar bstims pas/ AHdang / hUM dang / byang chub sems gsum du 'dres pa las
127a6(tsa): thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' dang / kun tu bzang po'i sras su gyur te/ sems can thams cad rgyal ba'i sras su bzhes/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang
127a7(tsa): rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur te/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'dzin cing byang chub sems kyis dbang byin te bzhag pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la
127b1(tsa): byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dbul ba ni// me long rang yul can gyi nang du bzhag la/ srin mtheb kyi phyag rgya bya/ gtso bo dang 'khor yan chad la mchod pa phul bas/
127b2(tsa): dges pa chen po bdud rtsis mnyes nas dngos grub stsol zhing byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'o// de nas byang chub sems las rdo rje tshe'i dngos grub blang ba ni//
127b3(tsa): dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad yab yum gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad pa'i byang chub kyi sems kun dkar tsa ra ra zags pas bdag gi byang chub kyi sems dang 'dres
127b4(tsa): te/ lce la blangs pas tsit+ta la thim pas/ ye shes sems dpa' sku mtshon gang bar gyur te/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung du gyur to// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i cho ga
127b5(tsa): rdzogs so// / tshogs kyi mchod pa'i rgyud chen po las/ tshogs kyi mchod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas tshogs
127b6(tsa): kyi mchod pa'i grangs ni// rab kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dbul bar bya'o// 'bring gis dus bzhir dbul bar bya'o// thams kyang nyin lan re mtshan
127b7(tsa): lan re dbul bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyad thang re zhing grol thang re dang / smin pa'i mchog re re 'grub par gsungs so// de la tshogs kyi mchod
128a1(tsa): pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgyud mtshan nyid kyi theg pa ltar dka' ba da ltar spyad nas 'bras bu phyis 'ong du re ba ma yin te/ tshogs kyi 'bras bu ni yi ge
128a2(tsa): 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la sa bcu rim bgrod mi dgos te/ da lta nyid nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams
128a3(tsa): kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni// phung po 'di nas mya ngan 'das// rigs 'dzin sa la bde bar gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs
128a4(tsa): rgyas kun mnyes te/ byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur nas// dngos grub dam pa stsol bar mdzad// chos kyi sku dang gnyis su med// ces sangs rgyas rnams
128a5(tsa): gsung ngo // de la tshogs kyi mchod pa 'dis// yun ji tsam gyis 'grub ce na// rab kyis zla ba gcig na 'grub// 'bring gis lo gcig dag na 'grub// thams lo gsum
128a6(tsa): tshun chad du// tshogs kyi mchod pa phul byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring // zhes gsungs so// tshogs
128a7(tsa): phul ba'i yon tan ni/ 'jig rten khams 'dir yang rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i zhal mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ma mo dang mkha' 'gro thams cad sprin srung bzhin du
128b1(tsa): gtibs te/ ci bsgo ba'i bka' nyan cing dngos grub kyis stongs dang grogs byed cing mthu dbang phun sum tshogs par byin te/ thams cad du bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa
128b2(tsa): dang ldan pa dang / longs spyod thams cad 'phel ba dang / 'khor thams cad 'du zhing nad dang du' mi 'byung zhing 'jig rten gyi lham srin thams cad kyis kyang bka' nyan
128b3(tsa): cing byin che bar mthong ba dang / de la gar gyi spyi gtsug ltar len pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis kyang mig gi 'bras bu ltar mthong ste/ yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar
128b4(tsa): 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten phyi mar rigs 'dzin thams cad kyis mdun bsu ste lcang lo can gyi gnas su phyin par skyel bar 'gyur ro// tshogs ma phul ba'i
128b5(tsa): skyon ni bsgrubs kyang don med cing // bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyang zhal 'dzum pa mi mdzad cing / bsod nams kyi skal ba'i shas chung ste/ dmyal ba dang / yi dwags
128b6(tsa): dang byol song gi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po rdzogs so// de nas byang chub sems
128b7(tsa): dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ de lta bu'i tshogs rgyud chen po 'di/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du snang bar 'gyur/ sems can rnams la ji ltar phan gdags par
129a1(tsa): 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud
129a2(tsa): chen po 'di ni/ 'dod khams dang / gzugs khams dang / gzugs med pa'i rigs thams cad du khyab par gyur to// dang po 'og min gyi gnas su
129a3(tsa): ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa las rgyu blangs te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ thams cad chos kyi skur sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas
129a4(tsa): gzugs khams kyi lha tshogs su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khya bas/ dpal tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyis rgyu byas te/ lha'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa la gzhi blangs te/
129a5(tsa): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byam 'khor dang bcas pa la/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po phul bas/ lha'i ris 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ phung po mi
129a6(tsa): gnas pa'i mya ngan 'das pas/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyu bar byed// de nas drang srong rnams kyi ris la rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab
129a7(tsa): bas/ drang srong rnams kyis 'byor pa'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pas/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ drang srong la sogs pa rim kyis
129b1(tsa): phung po mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byed do// de nas klu'i ris su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab
129b2(tsa): pas/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pas/ klu'i longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i longs spyod kyis/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa
129b3(tsa): ma lus pa la tshogs kyi mchod pa phul bas/ klu'i rigs 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa lus ma bor bar/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas mngon par
129b4(tsa): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// de nas mi'i gnas su rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'dis khyab na yod/ mi'i gnas na snod du gyur pa dang /
129b5(tsa): rig pa cha phra mo yod pa dang / sprul pa'i sku la gnas pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi dad pa'i rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / 'go ru dang / sha drang dang /
129b6(tsa): bstan 'jam dang / khyim bdag gi ris dang / las kyi 'phro can la sogs pa rnams kyis dang du blangs te/ rgyal srid dang / longs spyod dang /
129b7(tsa): grogs mchog tu bcas te rab tu dben pa'i gnas su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs gsol te/ bde bar gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal ba
130a1(tsa): rgya mtsho dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ rnal 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po phul te/ 'phags pa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong bar byas so//
130a2(tsa): tshom bu grangs brgya dang / stong la sogs pas kho mo'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ lus mabor bar tshe 'di nyid la mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas
130a3(tsa): su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// rgyu de la brten nas dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
130a4(tsa): rten la sogs pa sgo bkag ste/ rim gyis bla na med pa'i lam la bkod par byed do// gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas te/ dmyal
130a5(tsa): bar ltung nges pa yang rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'di gzhung bzhin du phul nas/ man+dAr med pa'i gnas su mi ltung ste/ bde bar 'gro ba'i gnas su
130a6(tsa): skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig rtsa ba dang yan lag dam tshig nyams pa yang gzhan gyis mi skongs te/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po 'dis
130a7(tsa): skongs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig gzhan la phan gdags par 'dod na yang las gzhan gyis mi 'grub ste/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po
130b1(tsa): 'di phul na/ gang phan gdags pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang zhig bar du gcod pa sgrol bar 'dod na yang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi mchod pa
130b2(tsa): 'di phul na/ yid la bsam bzhin du sgrol bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig 'jig rten 'di na bde ba dang mthu dbang phun sum tshogs par 'dod na yang /
130b3(tsa): rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di gzhung bzhin du phul na gang 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di yang // snod ma yin pa
130b4(tsa): dang / khye'u rnam can dang / dam la mi gnas pa dang / brna ba sems dang / 'dod pas brgyal ba rnams ni ma gtogs so// de nas sems
130b5(tsa): dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ rim kyis bla na med pa'i bsgrub pa lags na// mi la sogs pa thams cad kyis mthar rdzogs par 'gyur lags sam// rdo rje
130b6(tsa): sems dpas bka' sprul pa/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di// ris tshom bu dang grangs mang bar sangs rgyas par byed na yang / kun gyi thun mong du ma gsungs
130b7(tsa): te/ dper na til mar gyi rdzas la phog kyang sra zhing mkhreg par 'gyur na/ a tsa ka'i dog pa mgo la phog na tshal pa brgya ru 'gas par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ dmal mi
131a1(tsa): gnas shing gsang sngags tshig tsam 'khrungs phyung nas/ khengs dang / grags pa dang / phrag dog nyon mongs par rang rgyud du spyod pa rnams
131a2(tsa): kyis spyad kyang slar nyams pa'i gzhir 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di mi'i 'jig rten khyab par 'gyur na yang / phal cher lta ba dang mi ldan par 'byor pa
131a3(tsa): sna tshogs kyis mchod cing 'bul bar byed na yang don med pa ma yin te/ 'byor pa'i tshogs rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs skyed pa tsam las/ 'di
131a4(tsa): nyid du sangs mi rgya ba yang 'byung ngo // phal cher khungs phyung tsham dang / 'byor pa ma tshogs par 'bul ba dag kyang yod na// dmigs pa'i phan stobs tsam du 'gyur ba yang
131a5(tsa): yod do// gang zhig dgongs pa lhun gyis grub cing lta ba dang man ngag tu ldan pa la/ dus gsum du 'phags pa'i tshogs la/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs 'bul ba lta ci
131a6(tsa): smos kyis/ slob dpon de la ka mA ra ba zhes dro zhal gcig tsam drangs pa yang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod chen po phul ba dang 'dra bar skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro//
131a7(tsa): de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin to// de lta bu'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di/ lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du mtha'
131b1(tsa): spyod par 'gyur ro// mi'i 'jig rten na yang / bskal pa bzang po dang dus dang po la ni/ rgya gar gyi yul la sogs pa la yul gyi dbus dang / khrims dang tshul
131b2(tsa): la gnas pa'i rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi rigs la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyur spyad nas/ gu ru ma hA la sogs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs
131b3(tsa): bshad cing bkrol// bsrung zhing ma nyams par byas nas/ 'ga' dang 'ga' tsam las phal tshor mi spro ste/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgo nas mthar phyin cing mngon du
131b4(tsa): 'grub par 'gyur// bskal pa bar pa dang / dus bar pa la rgyal khams ris phal cher grags te/ rig pa'i sa thob pa dang // rgyud kyi don la mkhas
131b5(tsa): pa dang / man ngag dang / gnang dbang tshul bzhin thob par byas nas/ mtshan dang ldan pa'i mi mo dang / gzhung dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang / dad pa dang ldan pa'i pha
131b6(tsa): ri ha dang / khrims dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang / blon po la sogs pa grangs kyi tshom bur bsdus te bshad cing bstan pa dang / rtog bkrol zhing khu 'khrig dang the tshom ma
131b7(tsa): zos par byas te/ gnas dben pa dang 'gol bar// skye bo dang mi nag yongs kyis ma 'khrigs par// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs gsol nas/ dus
132a1(tsa): gsum 'phags pa'i tshogs la/ rnal 'byor gyi mchod pa chen po gzhung bzhin du phul bas/ 'di dang phyi ma gnyis ka'i don dus gcig tu bsgrubs
132a2(tsa): te/ gzugs mi yul nas ma 'phags par sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa dang / yongs kyis gsang zhing gsang sngags ga nyan zhing spyod pa rlabs po che ma 'phrig ste/
132a3(tsa): ya ka dang sgro skur 'debs shing gsang ba'i bka' thabs kyis smod par 'gyur/ bskal ba tha ma dang dus tha ma la ni/ gang zag gi tha dad dang / rgyal
132a4(tsa): po'i bka' khrims nyams pas/ mi smad rims nas dbang che ba dang / blon pos byas pas// so ga nang du ltas pa dang / rnal 'byor pa ma khrol bas bsrung mtshams
132a5(tsa): las 'das shing / gsang ba 'chol ba'i dbang gis/ mtha' 'khob dang / snod med pa dang / kla klo dang / tsir ba'i grong thams cad du gang la bas/ gsang sngags
132a6(tsa): 'chol te chos ni kun spyod// chos bzhin du ni gang yang mi byed// chos ni kun la yod par byas// rtogs ni slob dpon rang gis kyang ma rtogs/ dam tshig ni kun nod//
132a7(tsa): srun pa ni gcig kyang mi srun// slob dpon ni kun byed// dbang ni gang la yang med/ lad mo ni kun zlos/ nyams su ni gang gis kyang ma lon// dbang ni kun la bskur
132b1(tsa): chags pa ni gang la yang ma chag/ 'chad pa ni kun la 'chad// thog tu ni gang gis kyang ma phebs/ rtsom pa ni kun rtsom/ mthar gang gis kyang ma phyin pas/ phal cher
132b2(tsa): sgyid lug ste/ sngags las log pa dang / phal cher ma rtogs pas the tsom za ba dang / phal cher ya ka dang sgro skur 'debs pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod 'byor
132b3(tsa): pa rnams mi 'bul bar/ mi 'byor pa 'bul bar byed pas/ de'i dbang gis 'byor pa rnams kyang mnga' thang dang longs spyong bri nas/ 'tsham chad tsam 'bul bar byed cing /
132b4(tsa): bsod nams mi thob pa dang / phal cher 'byor pa sna tshogs gsogs te 'bul bar byed na yang / gsang med pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag dus 'di tsam nas longs
132b5(tsa): spyod 'di tsam bshams te/ tshogs mchod 'bul bar byed do// zhes bsgrags pa'i dbang gyis/ gtan pa can dang / brna ba sems dang / gnod sems dang /
132b6(tsa): nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i skyon dang / mkhas pa rnams mi 'chad par/ mi mkhas pa rnams che 'dod pa'i phyir 'chad pas/ mkhas pa rnams kyis bka' rgyud
132b7(tsa): gsang ba'i man ngag rnams brnags te sbas zer bas// bka' nges pa nub pa'i skyon gyis/ phal cher nyungs kyis dogs nas/ rang bzo'i dang / ke'u shang dang /
133a1(tsa): bsre bcol dang / ming tshig tu bsdebs pas// de la che bar mtshan brtags kyang rgyud la khungs med pa'i gang zag sprin du re ba'i rang thad du gyur pas//
133a2(tsa): ngal ba'i tshad pa dang / las brtsams pa'i gron tshogs su gyur cing grub pa'i dus ring ba dang / phal cher ra cod dang / gzu lums dang / rag sha'i bsnyon thabs su
133a3(tsa): byas te/ snang snang la ni sgrol/ phrad phrad la ni sbyor// rnyeng rnyed ni za// spyod pa 'chol ba'i dbang gis rnal 'byor gyi tshogs mchod du byed na yang / dper na zangs ma gser
133a4(tsa): du 'chos pa dang 'dra ste/ gser gyi dgos pa med pa dang 'dra'o// phal tshor bdag nyid kyi 'jug sgo dang / thos phyogs dang / 'dod btsan la/ 'di ni bzang la don dam
133a5(tsa): yin la/ gzhan gyi ngan pa ma yin no// chos nyid la phyogs ris med pa la/ phyogs dang ris su bcad pa'i skyon dang / 'khor dang sde ru cha phye ste/ phrag dog dang che chung gi
133a6(tsa): dbang gis/ mnyam pa'i don dam la 'gal bar gnas pa dang / phal cher theg pa'i ris so sor bzung ste/ rtsod pa'i chos shom pa'i dus na ni/ kun gyis 'bras bu bla na
133a7(tsa): med pa mi thob par/ ngan song gsum po sha stag tu ltung ba dang / sngon gyi ston pa'i bka' nub pas/ mi tshig 'phel bas bsgrub thag ring ba dang / dam tshig la sel
133b1(tsa): shor bas bsam pa mi 'grub cing // bar chad rkyen 'byung ba dang / dbang sgyur rims kyis ma bsgyur bas/ mthu byin chung ba dang / bsgom bsgrub kyi don 'thil du ma
133b2(tsa): phebs pas/ drod la ma phebs pa dang / shes pa'i rgyud ma khrol bas/ rtogs pa ma shar ba dang / mchod rdzas ma 'tshogs shing phud nyams pas/ dngos grub mi thob
133b3(tsa): ba dang / las dang man ngag gdeng du ma chud pas/ bar chod 'byung ba'i dus na yang / rnal 'byor pa 'ga' zhig/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po 'di ltar spyod
133b4(tsa): cing dang du len nus pa rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro// // sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ de lta
133b5(tsa): bu'i rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud 'di la// dam tshig gang lags// dbang gang lags// lta ba gang lags/ bsgrub pa gang lags/ spyod pa gang lags// lung
133b6(tsa): bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ de dag zhus pa legs so legs so//
133b7(tsa): de la tshogs kyi dam tshig ni// slob dpon bdag gi srog dang 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// srog bcad na 'chil/ srog ma bcad na brtan zhing / bde ba ris kyis thob
134a1(tsa): pa dang 'dra bar/ slob dpon dang 'thab pa dang smod pa lta ci smos/ yengs sam bral na yang / dge bar bar bcad cing man ngag mi thob pas/ dper na
134a2(tsa): srog dang 'jal bar lta ba dang / rgyal 'theb karma la sogs pa la// mig dang dbang po ltar bltas te/ dper na mig dbang po nyams pa dang med pa lta ci smos kyis/ bag
134a3(tsa): tsam gzer ba yang mi bzod pa dang 'dra bar// rgyal 'theb karma ging la 'thab rtsod dang smod pa lta ci smos kyis/ bag tsam ma mnyes na yang sgrib pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang /
134a4(tsa): mched dang ldum dral yan lag dang phung po 'dra/ gang snang kun g.yo zhing sdug bsngal mnyam par myong ba dang 'dra bar/ gnod pa tshabs po che lta ci smos kyis/ 'gal 'khrul
134a5(tsa): tsam byung na yang yong mi bde zhing / nyams pas 'chad pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas/ sku'i dam tshig srung zhing brtse gdung byas la/ dad pa che bar skyed la yangs par bya'o// sngags
134a6(tsa): dang phyag rgya dang / dgongs pa gsum ni/ dper na gtam dang / zas dang / gos 'dra ste/ phyi nang gtam gyis ma 'byal na/ gang yang mi 'grub ste/ 'tsho ba zas
134a7(tsa): kyis ma gsos na/ phung po mi theg/ dro ba'i gos ma gyon na nyon mongs pa dang 'dra bar/ snying po dang sngags ma bzlas na/ grub pa'i rtags mi 'ongs/ dgongs pa'i ting
134b1(tsa): nge 'dzin ma gsal na/ shes pa'i rgyud mi khrol/ phyag rgya dam du ma bcas na/ nyon mongs pa dang phung po gnas mi 'gyur bas/ dam du bcas te dang du blang ngo //
134b2(tsa): thugs kyi dam tshig ni gter sba ba dang 'dra'o// dper na rin po che gter sgrom du sbas na 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med cing // sgrom bu kha phye na 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed
134b3(tsa): pa dang 'dra bar/ gsang ba'i man ngag thams cad snod ma yin pa las spangs te/ bdag gi blo la btags na/ rtogs pa mngon du gyur nas/ 'bras bu mthar phyin
134b4(tsa): par 'gyur bas// gter dang 'dra bar dam du bca' 'o// gtan mi 'byung ba ni ma yin te/ gtan bdag dang bu spyod pa dang 'dra bar/ gsang ba'i man ngag bdag
134b5(tsa): dang bu dang 'dra ba las ma gtogs pa// bshad pa grangs bzhi las mangs na 'gal bar gsungs so// dus tha ma la bab pa'i tshe/ rtsa ba 'di rnams
134b6(tsa): mnos nas gang yang mi srun te/ sku yang nyams te 'thab rtsod shom pa dang / gsung yang nyams te/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin spangs te/ mdo sde bsam
134b7(tsa): gtan gyi don la spyod pa dang // thugs kyang nyams te/ brgya dang nyi shu la 'chad pa ni/ 'bras bu mnar med pa lta ci smos kyi/ dper na seng ge khog pa nang gis nang
135a1(tsa): bshig pa dang 'dra bar/ chos nyan du gang zag sngags pa rang gis mi ster te/ rang gis rang dmas so// rtsa ba'i dam tshig ma nyams na//
135a2(tsa): yan lag ljon pa dang 'dra bar skyes pa las/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // sum brgya drug cu dang / sa ma ya 'bum sde la sogs pa'i/ gang spyad pa'i yal ga lo 'dab dang 'dra
135a3(tsa): ba'i 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig 'di dag nyams par gyur na// tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / longs spyod rdzas su phul kyang bzhes su mi gnang zhing mnyes par
135a4(tsa): mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de la bsod nams med cing 'bras bu mi thob pa'i phyir ro// tshogs rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig gi le'u ste dang po'o// /
135a5(tsa): / de la tshogs rgyud chen po'i dbang la don rnam pa lnga ste/ d+ha ra ma tran tra nyan cing 'chang ba'i dbang dang gcig/ yi dam lha bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang dang
135a6(tsa): gnyis dkyil 'khor gnyen po zhal blta ba'i dbang dang gsum// tshogs kyi zhal zas la 'tshal zhing longs spyod pa'i dbang dang bzhi/ las kyi rdo rje las gang byed
135a7(tsa): pa'i ming gis dbang bskur ba dang lnga'o// de la d+ha ra ma tan tra nyan cing 'chad pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog
135b1(tsa): rnams/ ston pas nges par gsungs pa'i don// nyan cing yid la 'dzin pa dang / ma 'dres ston pa'i dbang thob shogade nas yi dam gyi lha bsgom
135b2(tsa): zhing bsgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas/ bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i yi dam lha// me tog dbang gis phog pa 'di// sgom zhing
135b3(tsa): bsgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ de nas dkyil 'khor gnyen po zhal lta ba 'di skad do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// dur khrod 'bar ba'i
135b4(tsa): rdzas bsgral nas// sku gsung thugs su gsal bsgoms pa'i// lha zhi bsgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ de nas tshogs kyi zhal zas la 'tshal zhing longs spyad
135b5(tsa): pa'i dbang 'di skad do// rgyal bas mchod pas bgegs zhi zhing // mchod pa phul bas bgegs zhi nas// pha pham longs spyod bdud rtsi'i bcud// rnal 'byor tshogs
135b6(tsa): la longs spyod shog/ de nas las kyi rdo rje las gang byed pa'i dbang bskur ba 'di skad do// zhi rgyus dbang drag mngon spyod dang / 'phrin las drag dal gang
135b7(tsa): byebyad pa// las rnams che ge byed par shog/ rdo rje dbang gi ming thob shog/ tshogs rgyud chen po las// dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas
136a1(tsa): tshogs kyi lta ba la don rnam pa lnga ste/ tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du lta ba dang / 'byor pa thams cad longs spyod du lta ba dang / mchod pa
136a2(tsa): thams cad ye shes su lta ba dang / dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba dang / rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du lta ba'o// de la tshogs pa
136a3(tsa): thams cad dkyil 'khor du lta ba la/ rdo rje slob dpon dang mched lhum dral tshogs pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon dkyil yin la/ mched lcam dral 'khor yin par lta
136a4(tsa): ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad dgongs spyod gcig tu rgya mtsho glong gi dkyil 'khor du rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'o// dam rdzas tshogs pa thams cad kyang
136a5(tsa): dkyil 'khor te/ byang chub sems ni dkyil yin la/ dam rdzas gzhan ni 'khor yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bde ba chen po'i don la/ skye shi med pa'i dkyil
136a6(tsa): 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'o// rdzas dang lag cha tshogs pa thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor te/ ban d+hu bde bar gshegs pa'i don la/ skye shi med pa dkyil yin pas/
136a7(tsa): dur khrod kyi chas brgyad gzhan ni 'khor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i rol pa chen pos rnam par rtog pa thams cad chos nyid du lhun gyis grub pa'i
136b1(tsa): dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin no// de la 'byor pa thams cad longs spyod du lta ba ni/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang / nang bcud kyi 'jig rten 'di dag thams
136b2(tsa): cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshogs kyi longs spyod du byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus su/ byol song thams cad kyis lus tshogs su phul ba dang / gshin rje thams cad
136b3(tsa): kyis sha chen tshogs su phul ba dang / ma mo dang mkha' 'gro yis khrag dang snum chen tshogs su phul ba dang / srin po thams cad kyis thong rus dang 'bru mar tshogs su phul ba
136b4(tsa): dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis 'dza' gang rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshogs su phul ba dang / ma mo klu rnams kyis snying po rnam pa sna tshogs tshogs su phul ba dang / byol song rnams
136b5(tsa): kyis 'o ma rnam pa sna tshogs su phul ba dang / nam mkha' lding rnams kyis shing thog sna tshogs su phul ba dang / sman gyi lhas sman sna tshogs su 'bul ba dang / rtsi'i
136b6(tsa): lha mos rtsi sman sna tshogs su 'bul ba dang // nam mkha' lding gis spos sna tshogs 'bul ba dang // sa bdag rnams kyis 'bru sna sna tshogs pa tshogs su 'bul ba dang //
136b7(tsa): mi rnams kyis mi'i zhal zas su sna tshogs pa tshogs su 'bul ba dang / lha rnams kyis rin po che sna tshogs pa dang / lha'i me tog man dar ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs
137a1(tsa): pa dang / lha'i 'od dod pa longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ tshogs su 'bul ba la sogs pa thams cad/ dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas thams cad
137a2(tsa): kyis rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi longs spyod chen por byin gyis brlabs te gsol// gzhan yang 'grangs shing tshim par mdzad de/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mngon sum du bkod
137a3(tsa): pas 'byor pa thams cad tshogs kyi longs spyod du lta'o// de la mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba ni/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad thugs
137a4(tsa): yang dag pa'i ye shes chen po'i ngang las byung ste// bar chod pas thugs dam bskul// dngos grub nod// slar 'dus pas sgrib pa sbyangs/ dngos grub thob ste/ lha la lha
137a5(tsa): thims/ ye shes la ye shes rol/ chos nyid la chos nyid thim ste/ bar mchod pas bdag gi sems dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes mnyam zhing dbyer med
137a6(tsa): par mchod pa phul// slar 'dus pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ye shes dang / bdag gi sems mnyam zhing dbyer med de/ ye shes kyi mchod pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyun
137a7(tsa): bdud rtsi'i ro bzhin byang chub sems kyi ngo bo la/ rgyal ba'i cho 'brang zer dang ye shes la spyod pa mdzad pas/ mchod pa thams cad ye shes su lta ba'o//
137b1(tsa): dmigs pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba ni/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la rgyal ba'i ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la dmigs la/ yang phung po dang / khams
137b2(tsa): dang / skye mched dang / rnam par shes pa nyid lha rgyud du snang ba las ma gtogs pa/ gzhan gud na med par rtogs pa'i lta bas rtogs par byas la/ ji ltar ga na ma ris
137b3(tsa): brag thams cad 'byung ba ltar bsdus la// skye 'gro thams cad 'byung ba lnga dang phung po lngar bsdus la/ 'byung ba lnga dang phung po thams cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang
137b4(tsa): bzhin yang yin la/ rtogs pa'i lta bas rtogs par byas la/ ting nge 'dzin gyis yang bsgoms te/ mdun dang shar rdo rje rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo dang / zhing khams
137b5(tsa): dang pho brang gi rang bzhin/ g.yas dang lho thams cad rin chen rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo'i zhing khams dang / pho brang gi rang bzhin// rgyab dang nub thams cad pad+ma rigs
137b6(tsa): kyi lnga dang / lha mo'i zhing khams dang / pho brang gi rang bzhin// g.yon dang byang thams cad las kyi rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo'i zhing khams dang / pho brang gi rang bzhin
137b7(tsa): steng dang nam mkha' sku thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi lha dang / lha mo'i zhing khams dang / pho brang gi rang bzhin/ sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang /
138a1(tsa): khro bo dang / khro mo dang / zhing khams dang / pho brang dang / dkyil 'khor lha rgyud kyi rang bzhin du rtogs par byas la yid kyis dmigs la// dmigs
138a2(tsa): pa thams cad lha rgyud du lta ba'o// rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du lta ba ni// phyi nang snod bcud kyis bsdus pa thams cad 'byung ba lngas bsdus la/
138a3(tsa): 'byung ba lnga po nyid yum chen mo lnga'i mkha' glong rnam par dag pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ dpag cing gzhal ba las 'das pa'i gzhal yas khang yin
138a4(tsa): pa las/ de ltar du ma rtogs na gzhan nas gzhal yas khang gnyen ris su bcad pa med pas/ rtogs pa thams cad gzhal yas khang du lta ba'o// tshogs rgyud chen po las/
138a5(tsa): lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas tshogs kyi bsgrub pa lnga yang don rnam pa lnga ste/ sku'i bsgrub pa dang / gsung gi bsgrub pa dang / thugs
138a6(tsa): kyi bsgrub pa dang / yon tan gyi bsgrub pa dang / 'phrin las kyi bsgrub pa gang byed kyang // rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyis bsgrub dgos te//
138a7(tsa): rnal 'byor gyi tshogs 'di ni lan tshwa dang 'dra ste/ gang la yang mi tshang du mi rung ste/ sku'i sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la tshogs kyi mchod pa gzhung bzhin du phul na//
138b1(tsa): sku'i bsgrub pa yang 'grub cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba bzhin du/ gsung dang thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyang / de bzhin du gang bsgrub pa tshogs kyis grub pa'o// de'i
138b2(tsa): don ni gzhung du ma dag las rgya cher 'byung ngo // tshogs rgyud chen po las/ bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas tshogs kyi longs spyod pa la
138b3(tsa): yang don rnam pa gsum ste/ tshogs kyi spyod pa thabs dang shes rab tu spyod pa dang / tshogs kyi spyod pa spong len med par spyod pa dang / tshogs kyi spyod pa 'ching grol
138b4(tsa): med par spyod pa'o// de la tshogs kyi spyod pa thabs dang shes rab tu spyod pa ni/ yo ga phyi ba man chod kyi sgor zhugs pa// tshogs mchod lta ci smos kyi//
138b5(tsa): 'dod pa'i yon tan gang la yang skyon lta ba'i nang nas kyang / thabs dang shes rab la 'ching bas bshal thag gtad pa ste// rdo rje theg pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i gnas
138b6(tsa): skabs na/ thams cad thabs dang shes rab dbyings dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin pas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan la sogs pa thams cad la/ ma spangs par 'jol nyog
138b7(tsa): tu spyod pa ma zad// de nyid chos nyid dag pa'i rgyan du rig nas// dga' bde longs spyod pa nyid kyi/ gnyis su med pa chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur ba'o//
139a1(tsa): de la tshogs kyi spyod pas spong len med par spyod pa ni/ yog phyi ba man chad kyis 'di gtsang ma rigs yin te 'phags pa mchod rgyu yin la/ 'di mi
139a2(tsa): gtsang ba dang sme ba yin pas 'phags pa mchod rgyu ma yin zhes// spong len du spyod pa ma yin// chos la bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la/ rnam par rtog pa'i ming yang med pas/
139a3(tsa): gtsang ma yang lha yi zhal zas yin la/ mi gtsang ba yang lha'i zhal zas// gnyis su med pa nyid 'phags pa'i dgongs spyod dang / 'phags pa'i skur sgrub pas/ gang la
139a4(tsa): yang 'di 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyu yin pas spong ngo // 'di thar pa dang bde ba dang gtsang ba'i rgyu yin zhes dang du mi len te/ spong len med pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa yin/
139a5(tsa): tshogs kyi spyod pa 'ching grol med par spyod pa na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs pa las/ chags tsam na chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pas// 'khon
139a6(tsa): ba dang nyon mongs pas 'ching ba med pa/ de nyid rtogs pa'i rgyan du rig cing / chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin pas/ de ltar spyod pa grol ba yang med/ 'ching
139a7(tsa): ba yang med do// tshogs rgyud chen po las/ spyod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas de skad bka' stsal pas/ rigs lnga yab yum
139b1(tsa): dang 'khor sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / sprul pa dang / yang spul dang / ci bgyis dang / bka' nyan dang / dam la btags
139b2(tsa): pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis/ dgyes pa chen po tshogs kyi longs spyod du bstar nas/ thams cad gnyis su med pa chos kyi skur lhun gyis grub par bzhugs so//
139b3(tsa): rnal 'byor gyi tshogs rgyud chen po rdzogs so// // 'di'i rgyud phyi ma 'di 'gyur ro// gsang ba gsum gyi phub tu// sgrub sangs rgyas ye shes rin po
139b4(tsa): ches skad bsgyur gyis yang bcos te/ stong tshab byang chub rin po che la btsas su bzhag pa'o// mya nga ha ta pa ri las/ 'phags pa rgya mtsho yis bris/ bkor du mi
139b5(tsa): 'tshal ba'i rgyud gsum bzhugs so// // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra a mri ta tan tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud//
