207a5(tsa): rtsibs la bskyon// 'phang ngo rgya mtsho'i gting du 'phang // sbyin no gnod sbyin sras su sbyin// gtad dog shin rje'i lag tu gtad// dpag tshad lnga brgya'i 'og shed na//
207a6(tsa): gshin rje rgyal po chos 'chad kyis// de yi drung du chos nyon cig/ byang chub sems ni ma skyes tsher// nams kyang gtang bar mi bya'o// nam zhig byang chub sems skyes
207a7(tsa): nas/ de tshe gnas ngan de las drang bar bya// oM la suM laM pri laM/ pri ti ta nan/ byi tsi ya sum+b+ha ya/ ma hA ya ga tal/ bag ma ni/ pa tsa la la la/ mar nan nan na na//
207b1(tsa): drag po'i las las/ mnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / rdo rje ngur mo'i me rgyud las/ khro bo'i las rdzogs so// / de nas
207b2(tsa): dpal rdo rje sems dpas las rnam bzhi'i tshul gyis hom bya ba 'di gsungs so// thog mar las gang byed pa'i kha dog bzhin/ phyag rgya chen por bsgyur zhing gnas bsrung /
207b3(tsa): bra 'og phyogs bzhir byin gyis brlab ste// re zhig las gar bya ba ma zin gyi bar du bar chad mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gdon bgegs rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mi 'da' bar
207b4(tsa): mtshams bcad/ mchod pa'i yo byad sbyar te/ lha bshos dang / mchod gtor dang / lan chags kyi gtor ma dang / me'i mchod pa'i rkyen phye mar dang / mar khu dang /
207b5(tsa): sman dri chu yan chad bshams te/ hom gyi yo byad sbyar ba la// me spar la ma reg par byas la/ 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs te/ mchod cing gtor ma mchod gtor bsngo ste/
207b6(tsa): las ma zin gyi bar du mi dgye/ phyi gtor ni 'phral du dgye/ 'phags pa man chad dang / phyi gtor du bsdus pa rnams la yang 'di skad du/ deng gnod byed thams cad bkug
207b7(tsa): cing sbyin sreg mdzad du gsol/ phan gnod byed pa rnams mtshams bcad/ 'phrin las ma rdzogs kyi bar du mi gshegs stong grogs mdzod cig ces bcol la/ bdag
208a1(tsa): gis kyang de bzhin dmig sa/ hom khung zur gsum tshad bzhin brkos la/ kha tshon bskor maN+Dal zheng khru gang tsam zhig bgyis la/ tshon mthing nag
208a2(tsa): / de'i steng du rtson dmar pa 'od 'bar bri/ rdo nur gsum gcog / oM A ng+ku DUr ri TIs pa/ chos zung gin bsgru ba no// de nas shing rnon pa skyer ba dang /
208a3(tsa): ba dang / shug pa dang / seng ldeng dang / sbyar ba dang / thang shing rnams 'phreng cig tu gshog la/ srid du khru re re yam shing skam po gong ma dang mnyam por bgyis la/ 'di
208a4(tsa): rnams hom khung du 'greng bur rdzang zhing / byin gyis brlabs pa'i snying po/ oM ha si/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad man chad/ sum cu yan chad bzlas shing brdzangs lags nas/ yan
208a5(tsa): shing gi dbus su rdzang ma'i sol ba nyung shas blugs la// pags pa nag po 'am snam bu nag pos kha bcad de/ me sbar nas dar nag po kha gang mda' la btags nas/ me
208a6(tsa): bdag gi nyams dang sbyar te sa bon mthe bong tsam mam btsa ka tsam zhig gsal la/ hom khung gi zur gsum du chu blugs la/ me nyams chen chus dag nga/ mi che na me la ma thug
208a7(tsa): tsam mam phye man chad bkang la/ ha ha ha zhes lan gsum brjod la/ me lha nag po 'khor dang bcas te byon nas/ mnyes shing mdangs byung bar bsams nas/ shar phyogs
208b1(tsa): nas me lha dkar po sku dkar ser dbu ral pa can phyag na ba dan dkar po thogs pa/ sbyin kham pa la zhon pa/ lho phyogs kyi me lha nag po ag+ni/ sku mdog sngon po dbu gsum ral
208b2(tsa): pa mdun du 'khyil ba/ phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga thogs pa/ sbyin sngon po ru gcig la zhon pa/ byang phyogs kyi me lha ljang khu gsus po che phyag na dbyug pa thogs pa/ rlung lug gro mo rA
208b3(tsa): lhag pa g.yas su 'khyil ba la zhon pa/ nub phyogs kyi me lha dmar po ral pa can phyag na ba dan dmar po thogs pa/ shing rtal bcibs pa/ 'di rnams phyogs bzhi nas lcags kyus
208b4(tsa): drangs nas sku la me 'bar zhing hom khung nang du byon te/ zhal nas hU dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing / ha ha ha zhes gsungs pas// sku dang zhal gyi nang nas me lam lam 'bar zhing byon par
208b5(tsa): byin gyis brlabs par bsam/ me lha chen mo ko'u ri dang / tso'u ri dang / pra mo ha dang / pu ka si dang / ag+ne dang / tsun+da ma dang / ko'u shi ka dang / gzi can dang / 'bar
208b6(tsa): ma la sogs pa'i sku las me stag 'phro zhing du ba 'thul bar bsam/ hom khung du byon nas me 'bud de/ me 'bar bar bsam/ rlung gi rgyal po rkang mgyogs pa la zhon pa/ lag na
208b7(tsa): ru mtshon dmar po dang rlung gi rgyal ba thogs pa hom khung du byon te/ me 'ur 'ur 'bud par bsams te/ 'di rnams kun kyang lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang snying pos spyan drangs te/
209a1(tsa): dus gcig tu me 'bud cing 'bar bar bsams la/ gdong bzhi pa'i phyag rgya bcas te/ me sba ra ba'i snying po/ oM badz+ra ra ra hU hUM yaM ya ra/ zhes brgya rtsa
209a2(tsa): brgyad bzlas te dga' ba'i mdangs byung ste/ ha ha ha zhes lan gsum brjod// 'ur 'ur 'ur zhes lan gsum brjod pas me 'bar bar bsams la/ dbyangs snyan pa blangasate
209a3(tsa): bstod ra dang me 'bud pa'i las bya ba'i thugs dam paskul te/ g.ya ba dar gyis g.yab cing snying po bzlas shing me spar ro// me 'bar nas mar khu phye mar dri chab btsal bas mche/
209a4(tsa): nas/ las ci bcol ba rnams grub par gsol/ gdon bgegs sam ming rus bris te/ bgegs gtor yang drung gzhag la/ gdon len te drang zhing hom khung gi nang du
209a5(tsa): gzugs drangs la/ dam gtor spar te dang bcug la/ me sman chus ma shi ba tsam du gsad de/ yang spar 'bar re la na re mchod cing / dbyangs dang / bstod pa dang / bskul
209a6(tsa): zhing las bya/ 'di bzhin lan gsum tsam brgya/ hom khung nang du chu blugs pa'i tshe/ dza ya dza ya zhes/ rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes brjod do// chu'i chu dpal lan gsum g.yeng
209a7(tsa): zhing bshal bas/ 'phags pa chu dpal dang lha'i byin brlabs kyis/ bgegs kyi gdug sems zhi zhing bag chags byang bar bsam mo// hom khung dngos ni rin po che'i gzhal
209b1(tsa): yas khang / zur ni sku gsung thugs/ shing ni rigs lnga'i thugs dam dang / ma bdun gyi 'khor dang / khro bo dang / khro mo'o// me ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin// chu ni chos kyi
209b2(tsa): dbyings kyi rang bzhin te/ dgra bgegs ho ma khung du song ba tsam gyis/ bag chags byang zhing mtho ris su thar pa 'am/ yang na 'phags bla rnams dang me lha'i zhal dngos su
209b3(tsa): bstabs shing / rnam par shes pa mtho ris spar ro// mnan pa zhig bya na yang hom khung dgra bgegs bkug la/ lo grangs 'di tsam zhig gi bar du 'di nas gzhan du 'gror
209b4(tsa): mi gnang bar mtshams bcad cing gzir la dam chu ngam gtor byin la/ hom khung nang nas me'i sa bon tsam man chad phyir dbyung / 'phags pa dang me lha hom khung du bzhugs pa
209b5(tsa): la mchod de/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags la/ la gor hom khung kha bcad de/ mnan pa'i phur pas steng nas gdab bo// rdo rje dur mo'i tan+t+ra las/ rdo rje sems
209b6(tsa): dpa' zhal gdams kyi hom rgyud kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal gdams kyi me rgyud rdzogs so// /
209b7(tsa): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+wa la kro d+hI tan+ta/ bod skad du/ dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das zhi khro'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
210a1(tsa): thos nas bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ ji ltar snang zhing srid pa dang / mthong zhing thos pa dang / bstan cing rtogs pa 'di dag thams cad ye nas ma g.yos
210a2(tsa): shing / ma bcos pa'i med pa'i chos nyid la/ snang na ni lha dang lha mo'i sku gsung thugs/ phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du snang la// mi snang na dngos po dang / mtshan ma dang /
210a3(tsa): gzung 'dzin dang / rtag chad du mi snang ba yin la/ yod na ni sems kyi ye shes gsal la ma bsgribs par sangs rgyas par yod la/ med na gnyis su snang ba dang / phyogs dang
210a4(tsa): ris su phye ba med pa yin la/ rol na thabs dang / shes rab/ dbyings dang ye shes dga' ba dang / bde ba'i longs spyod chen por rol pa yin la/ mi rol na chos nyid mnyam
210a5(tsa): pa nyid kyi ngang la/ gang la yang ma chags/ gang la yang mi 'dzin// gang la yang mi gnas pa yin pas/ ma rig pa'i dbang gis rtog pa'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab par snang
210a6(tsa): bas/ dper na nam mkha' la 'di zhes gzung rgyu med pa la/ mig nad can la sogs pa 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ji ltar yang snang la/ snang ba'i dbang gis tha dad par snang ba bzhin
210a7(tsa): duyang dag pa'i chos nyid la gang yang 'grub pa med pa la/ log pa dang 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang ste/ chos nyid snang ba ma rtogs pas ma rig pa'i dbang du gyur sa
210b1(tsa): ma rig pa'i dbang gis mun pa'i smag bzhin 'thibs pas/ ye shes kyi snang ba nub par gyur to// rtog pa'i dbang gis las sna tshogs par snang bar gyur to// nyon mongs pa'i
210b2(tsa): dbang gis 'du byed sna tshogs par snang bar gyur to// phyin ci log gi dbang gis gol ba sna tshogs su gyur to// 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rgyu 'bras sna tshogs su gyur to// sdig
210b3(tsa): pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal sna tshogs su gyur to// las kyi dbang gis nyon mongs shing myong ba sna tshogs su gyur to// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khrul pa la
210b4(tsa): las rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig mi 'da' ba'i chos nyid la 'da' bar byar med pa la/ rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa la mi rigs shing 'da' ba'i las byas pas/ 'jig
210b5(tsa): rten gyi khams 'dir yid du mi 'ong ba la sogs pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ mnar med pa'i dmyal ba la sogs par sdug bsngal sna tshogs las nam yang
210b6(tsa): thar pa'i dus med par skyes pa dang / 'khrul pa la las 'dod pa dang longs spyod la chags pa'i dbang gis mchod pa dang rgyu rkyen la sogs pa rnams/ brkam chags sna tshos
210b7(tsa): par spyad dbang gis/ yi dgas la sogs pa'i gnas su yun ring bar 'khod pa dang / 'khrul pa'i las la gti mug gi dbang gis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la thug
211a1(tsa): thub tu spyad pa dang / thams cad ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis bab bcol du gyur pas/ byol song la sogs pa'i gnas su skyes nas/ de la skye 'chin yang
211a2(tsa): slar lus de nyid len cing bskal pa yun ring bar gnas pa dang // de bzhin du mi dang / lha dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa'i 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'thab rtsod pa dang / 'gyur ba'i
211a3(tsa): sdug bsngal la sogs pa nyams su myong zhing 'khor ro// 'khrul pa la las brten cing bsgregs pa dang / sgom zhing bsgrub par bya ba rnams ni/ bdag gis ma rtogs shing gzhan
211a4(tsa): la ma khrol bar byas// gsang zhing sba ba dang thabs kyis spyad pa rnams ni/ bdag gi ngo thon dang gsang mtshams med par spyad la/ gzhan la yang de ltar bstan cing de bzhin du
211a5(tsa): bsgom ste/ lta bas chod pa thams cad la bsgom pa dang / bsgom pas mchod par ci la yang 'jug pa dang / bsgrub pa mthar ma phyin par las rnam pa sna tshogs pa brtsams te/
211a6(tsa): bdag nyid phung po lha'i dkyil 'khor du sgrol ma shes par/ sems can gzhan la mngon spyod kyis sgrol ba'i las la bab bcol bar byas pa dang / bdag nyid sems kyi chos nyid
211a7(tsa): ma skyes pa la/ rtogs pa'i ye shes sbyor ma shes par/ gzhan du yid 'ong ba la glags la bab pa dang / thabs 'og tu chud pa dang // rdo rje g.yos pa'i dbang gis/ mo'i
211b1(tsa): rigs snang snang la sbyor ba'i las bab bcol bar byas pa dang / bdag nyid bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gsal bar/ gzhan drang bar 'dod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i
211b2(tsa): dpon byas te/ gzhan tshom bu la sogs pa bsdus nas/ bka' bzhin du ni gang yang ma byas/ 'phrin las kyis lung tshol bar sna tshogs par byas pa dang / bdag nyid bsgrub
211b3(tsa): pa'i rtsal ma rdzogs par/ 'jig rten gyi khe grags dang gzhan thub par 'dod pa'i mthu rtsal 'dod pa'i phyir/ mu stegs la sogs pa'i log pa'i chos dang / de la brten pa'i gang
211b4(tsa): zag gis 'dod pa tshol ba'i bcos bu dang / 'phral bsdebs byas nas dam med pas/ gzhan la bslus pa'i 'gal ba chen po la khrims phyung nas// dang du len par byed pa
211b5(tsa): dang / bdag nyid dngos grub gsal bar ma thob par/ gzhan gyis bkur bar 'dod pa dang / btsun zhing mkhas par 'dod pa'i phyir/ lung las btus pa dang / yid las
211b6(tsa): phyung ba'i skan dngags su sdebs sbyor byas nas/ gzhan la 'chad cing ston par byed pa dang / bdag nyid rgyal ba'i bka' rgyud gsal bar ma gyur pas/ gzhan las bdag nyid
211b7(tsa): chungs par mthong bas/ bdag nyid kyi phyogs bsdus nas gzhan dang ris su bcad nas/ bka' 'di las lhag pa gzhan na med do zhes smra bar byed cing / de'i sde dang 'khor
212a1(tsa): gyis kyang de bzhin du rang rang gi ris bzung zhing che bar phyung nas/ gsang ba'i don blo la mason pa'i smra ba'i rgyu chung bas/ gsang ba skad smra zhing
212a2(tsa): nyon mongs pa'i mthu gting brtas par byed pa dang // bdag nyid nyon mongs pa la shas cher spyad pas// gzhan yang de la lan ldon pa'i dbang gis// bdag dang gzhan
212a3(tsa): dngos su 'thab pa dang / skyon dang zol la sogs pa bshams nas/ 'khrugs pa dang gsod pa la sogs pa byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyis mi rtag pa dang /
212a4(tsa): sgyu ma lta bu'i don mi shes pas/ mi chos kyi blon po lta bu dang / 'du 'jig yeng spyod pa'i las byed pa dang // de lta bu'i log par 'dren pa'i slob ma mang pa'i
212a5(tsa): dbang gis/ gzhan thams cad kyang de lta bu'i las byed pa dang / gcig la gcig 'dzugs pa dang / 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'phrog cing rlom pa dang / che ba
212a6(tsa): dang bkur ba'i rim pa med par gnad du btsugs nas// log pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs pa shom pa dang / log pa dang sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs par spyod pa'i
212a7(tsa): dbang gis/ yongs kyis dpyad sla bar gyur nas// kun kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyams su myong nas/ bsgrub pa la don med cing
212b1(tsa): dus ma yin par tshe zad nas/ dam tshig nyams pa rnams ni sems can dmyal ba'i yang gting du skye bar 'gyur ro// nam yang thon pa'i dus med pa yin no// phal pa rnams
212b2(tsa): dang slob ma rnams kyis sna drangs nas/ mnar med pa ma gtogs pa yan chad nas/ nyi tshe ba man chad du bskal pa du ma zhig gi bar du sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/ de las
212b3(tsa): thar nas byol song yi dgas kyi gnas su skyes na yang / sngon gsang sngags spyod tsam na/ zhe sdang gi dbang gis mgo lus mang bar bsgoms pa'i kha mig mgo lus mang bar
212b4(tsa): skyes nas// der yang sdug bsngal shas cig nyams su myong nas/ de nas thar nas skye na yang thar pa'i sgo lho nub pas// gnas kyang lho nub mtshams dur khrod ka ra sa ga zhes
212b5(tsa): bya bar skyes// de dngos po 'dzin pa'i dbang gis// lho nub mtshams de la yang phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar gnas/ tha ma grong khyer gyis bskor ba// phyi mtha' dur khrod kyi tshogs
212b6(tsa): mang bar gnas pa'i yul du skyes// de la gnas pa de la yang rang rgyud kyi gnas ma yin khro ba'i las kyi dbang gis snang ba'o// de lta bu'i dbus na/ sngon gsang sngags kyi don
212b7(tsa): spyod tsan// dngos po la rtog par 'dzin pa'i mthu brtas pas/ ru dra rnam pa gsum gyi bdag po dbus na gnas pa de/ sngon dngos po yod pa la che bar bsgoms pa'i dbang gis//
213a1(tsa): lus ri rab tsam la/ sdig pa'i las sngon du thal/ bsod nams kyi las phyir lus pas/ mdog kyang thal mdog sngo skyar 'dug pa/ nyon mongs pa dug
213a2(tsa): gsum gyi rtsa ba las/ nyon mongs pa bsam gyis mi khyab par sngon spyod pa'i mthus/ lag na yang mdung rtse gsum pa la sogs te/ mtshon chabasam gyis mi khyab pa thogs
213a3(tsa): pa sngon nyon mongs pa grags pa che ba'i 'khor dang smon lam mthun pas/ de'i 'khor yang shar gti mug che ba dri za'i sprin po/ lho nga rgyal che ba gshin rje'i srin po/ nub 'dod
213a4(tsa): chags che ba klu'i srin po/ byang phrag dog che ba gnod sbyin gyi srin po/ de rnams kyang chos nyid la chog shes med pa'i ting 'dzin med pas// kun kyang sems can mang po zos 'chos
213a5(tsa): kyang skem pa la hrid pa rtsa rgyus sra ba/ pags pa sker ma rus gong che ba'o// de rnams kyang sngon 'dod chags dang 'bral ma shes pas// chung ma re re dang 'khril te/ de rnams sngon
213a6(tsa): 'dod chags la chog pa'i dus med pas gzhan yid du 'ong ba'i byi mo dang / slas dang // dud 'gro la sogs pa'i mo rnams la chags pa spyad pa'i dbang gis// de rnams kyi 'khor
213a7(tsa): na srin po brgyad dang / mgo brnyan ma brgyad dang / sha za nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis/ gtso mo bzhi ste rtsa drug dang / las dang mngag gzhug sum brgya
213b1(tsa): drug cu dang / gsod pa bco brgyad/ yang bran brgyad khri bzhi stong / sum brgya drug cu// bco brgyad/ bcu bzhi/ bzhi la sogs pa la bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi lag char bskur nas/
213b2(tsa): skye 'gro mtha' dag ni bsgral nas/ thams cad phung bar byas te/ gtsang sme med par za ste/ sta na'i las la dus dang rgyun med par byed// chung ma dang 'khor thams cad la bzang
213b3(tsa): ngan med par sbyor zhing / 'dod chags kyi las la dus dang rgyun mi 'chad par byed/ gsod gcod dang mi snyan pa'i sgra drag po dus med par grags/ sha dang rus pa ri ltar spungs
213b4(tsa): khrag dang chu ser mtsho ltar bskyil/ gzugs dang kha dog rdza ltar bklags/ gsur dang dud pa dri bsung sprin ltar gtibs/ ha ha dang kha kha 'brug ltar grags// mtshon cha dang
213b5(tsa): snag khrag char ltar 'bab/ gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/ srin mo nad gtong ma brgya dang / lcags kyi ti shwa sprul pa bzhi la sogs pa
213b6(tsa): btang ste/ dang po dud 'gros gnas bzhi la nad sna tshogs dang mtshon cha sna tshogs btang ste zos/ de nas gling bzhi'i mi zos/ de bzhin du 'dod khams dang / gzugs khams dang /
213b7(tsa): gzugs med pa'i khams ril dbang du bsdus shing zos te/ thams cad du gsod pa dang / sbyor ba'i las mtha' dag gtsor spyod cing / 'bras bu ngan song gsum dang mnar
214a1(tsa): med pa'i las sna tshogs pa bsgrub pa la// 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs
214a2(tsa): pas/ shin tu nyam thag cing gol bar gzigs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de dang cha mthun par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa kun tu bzang pos khro bo
214a3(tsa): thams cad kyi mchog he ru kAr sprul te/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad skul tshang zhing rdzogs nas/ khyab cing bdal ba'i phyir na/ dbu nyi shu rtsa
214a4(tsa): gcig phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su sprul/ yum kun tu bzang mo kro d+hi shwa ri ga nam zhal mar sprul nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i mkha' las rigs lnga'i sangs
214a5(tsa): rgyas yab yum rnam shes he ru ka ya ba yum bcur gyur te/ rnam par snang mdzad yab yum/ bud+d+ha he ru ka yab yum du gyur nas/ da cibs kyang sku che ba phyag mang ba
214a6(tsa): mtshon cha rno ba me dpung 'bar ba/ nga ro che ba mthu che ba drag cing rngam pa/ gsod pa la brtson par sprul te/ dregs pa chen po gtso bor ru dra dngos su bsgral lo//
214a7(tsa): yum gyis de'i chung ma bsgral lo// de bzhin du badz+ra he ru ka yab yum gyis/ shar gyi dri za srin po pho mo bsgral lo// rat+na he ru ka yab yum gyis/ lhor gshin rje'i
214b1(tsa): srin po pho mo bsgral lo// pad+ma he ru ka yab yum gyis/ nub klu'i srin po pho mo bsgral lo// karma he ru ka ya ba yum gyis/ byang gnod sbyin gyi srin po pho mo bsgral lo//
214b2(tsa): bdud dang srin po'i lag cha mdung rtse gsum ni// rgyal byed rtags kyi kha T+Ta khar bsnams so// pags pa g.yang gzhir sku la gsol lo// thod pa mnabs zhal mdzad do//
214b3(tsa): rnam par shes pa'i sems rigs nges pa'i sras su gyur pas/ rag shaM he ru ka'i skur gyur to// ngan song gsum du skye nges pa'i sras sems rig nges pa'i sras su bsgral
214b4(tsa): bas/ sa nu he ru kar gyur to// 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems ma rnams kyis kyang / de rnams kyi 'khor rnams btul te/ srin po de'i dur khrod grong khyer gyi shar phyogs
214b5(tsa): nasrin po chen mo keng thod ma zhes bya ba keng rus thod du bcings nas/ zhing gi dbyug pa dang thod khrag thogs nas/ dur khrod chen po'i khrag 'thung yul na 'khod pa la byams pa
214b6(tsa): dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis kyang mthul ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos/ khro mo ko'u ri mar sprul te/ lag pa g.yas na zhing gi dbyig pa thogs pas/
214b7(tsa): mo'i dbyig pa dbang du bsdus/ g.yon pa band rak+tas mo'i thod khrag dbang du bsdus/ sku dang 'od me dpung gis mo'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas/ srin mo nges bsams pa/
215a1(tsa): bdag pas kyang mthu byin che bas skyabs kyang btsal/ bdag dang spyod pa cha mthun pas lung stsal ba yang mnyan la/ bdag dang rigs gcig pa gcig
215a2(tsa): kyang gzod 'byung bsams pa las/ khro mo des smras pa/ khyod thod khrag dang zhing dbyug thogs nas khrag 'thung ba la don ci lta bu zhes smras pa las/ srin mo des gsol pa/
215a3(tsa): bdag bkres shing skom pa la chog pa'i dus med pas 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// khro mos smras pa/ de ltar ma yin te nga thod khrag thogs pa ni nyon mongs pa khrag dang 'dra ba de/ chos
215a4(tsa): nyid du zad par byed pa'i rtags yin la/ zhing gi dbyig pa ni ma rig cing gzhom pa'i 'khor ba rdul du rlog pa'i rtags yin no// zhes smras pas// srin mo des kyang de bzhin du
215a5(tsa): bsgoms pas/ srin mo des phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba'i don du ke'u'i bran dang yang bran dang / khol dang yang khol du dbang byin nas gzhag go//
215a6(tsa): de bzhin srin mo'i yul gyi lho phyogs/ dur khrod chen po 'jigs pa'i yul na/ srin mo 'da' 'phen mas sems can thams cad gsod cing za ste/ byams dang snying rje ni med/
215a7(tsa): nyon mongs parang ka ma la zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis kyang mthul ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos/ lha mo tso'u rim thabs kyis mda' 'gengs mar sprul
215b1(tsa): nas/ srin mo de dang spyod pa cha 'thun par byas nas btul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ bran dang yang bran dang / khol dang yang khol du dbang byin te gzhag go/ de bzhin du
215b2(tsa): srin po'i yul gyi nub phyogs dur khrod chen po 'dzin byed na/ srin mo 'dzin byed ma zhes bya ba lag na chu srin gson ma pir thogs pa/ sems can thams cad 'dzin cing mi gtong bar za ba la/
215b3(tsa): byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis kyang mthul ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis/ khro mo pra mo ha mdog dmar ba lag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs
215b4(tsa): par sprul te/ de dang spyod pa cha bstun zhing rigs gcig par byas nas btul te/ yang gong ma bzhin du gzhag go// srin po'i yul gyi byang phyogs dur khrod sgrol ba na/ srin mo pe ta nag mo
215b5(tsa): zhes bya ba/ lag g.yas pa spar khyim gdengs nas bus pa rdung ba/ g.yon pa bus pa khogs rangs su za ba cig gnas pa la/ yang cis kyang ma thul ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo//
215b6(tsa): rjes khro mo pi ta li g.yas rdo rje g.yon bus pa za bar sprul nas/ gong ma bzhin du gzhag go// srin po yul gyi shar lho mtshams na/ dur khrod 'dren byed ces bya ba na/ srin mo nang
215b7(tsa): khrol 'dren ma zhes bya ba sems can thams cad bsad nas/ nang khrol dang rgyu ma sha khrag rlon par za ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ khro mo pu ka sir sprul nas/
216a1(tsa): yang gong ma bzhin du gzhag go// srin mo yul gyi lho nub mtshams na/ dur khrod chen po'i tshal sngon na/ srin mo chen mo rab 'jigs ma zhes bya ba/ sems
216a2(tsa): can thams cad kyi mgo bo phor par bcad nas/ sha khrag tshil bus bkang ste sor mo gsum gyis dkrug cing 'thung ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel bas/
216a3(tsa): khro mo g+ha sa ma rir sprul nas btul te/ yang gong ma bzhin du gzhag go// srin mo yul gyi nub byang gi mtshams na/ dur khrod sa la zhes bya ba na/ srin mo chen mo srog gcod
216a4(tsa): ma zhes bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi sgying khrag rtsa ba nas phyung nas za ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ khro mo s+pha sha nir sprul nas btul te/
216a5(tsa): yang de bzhin du gzhag go/ srin po yul gyi byang shar mtshams na// dur khrod chen po ka ba la na/ srin mo chen mo skyon ma zhes bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi mgo lus
216a6(tsa): bcad nas/ smyon pa'i brtul zhugs kyis gar sha stag byed pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis/ khro mo tsan+da lir sprul nas/ yang de bzhin du btul
216a7(tsa): nas gzhag go// de nas srin po'i yul dang gnas kyi phyi rol na/ shar phyogs 'jigs pa chen mo'i yul na/ srin mo mgo brnyan ma 'joms byed chen mo seng ge'i mgo can
216b1(tsa): sems can thams cad kha long du blangs nas/ sprug cing ril mid par byed pa las// thabs cis kyang mthul ba las/ lha mo lA s+ya mas phra men ma si d+ha mar sprul te/
216b2(tsa): de dang spyod pa cha 'thun par byas nas btul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas// ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba'i don du bran dang yang bran dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog tu dbang byin
216b3(tsa): te gzhag go// lho'i phyogs gshin rje'i yul na/ srin mo 'phra men za byed stag mgo ma/ lag pa bsnol nas bam chen po la 'bru tshugs su lta ba la/ lha mo mA lems
216b4(tsa): 'phra men ma stag mgo can du sprul nas btul te/ de bzhin du gzhag go/ nub phyogs klu'i yul na/ srin mo 'phra men ma len byed ma zhes bya ba/ wa'i mgo can ma dpag
216b5(tsa): tshad brgya khri bzhi stong nas/ bam chen mo'i dri tshor nas len par byed pa la/ lha mo 'gir ti mas sri la mu kar sprul te btul nas/ de bzhin du gzhag go/ srin mo 'phra men ma nga
216b6(tsa): ro ma zhes bya ba/ byang phyogs gnod sbyin gyi yul na/ khyi'i mgo can bam chen po la 'drad cing za ba la/ lha mo nor ti mas 'phra men ma shA na mu kar sprul nas/ de bzhin
216b7(tsa): du btul te gzhag go// yang shar lho'i phyogs mtshams drang srong gi yul na/ srin mo 'phra men ma khrag 'thung ma/ bya rgod kyi mgo can mthong khrag 'thung ba la/ lha mo
217a1(tsa): d+hU pe mas kri d+ha mu khar sprul nas btul te gzhag go// lho nub ni rI ti'i yul na/ srin mo 'phra men ma rkang za ma zhes bya ba/ bya kang ka'i mgo
217a2(tsa): can ma bam chen po phrag la khur nas/ sha dang khrag dang rkang dang tshil bu za ba la/ badz+ra puspes 'phra men dur lha mo bya mar sprul nas btul te gzhag go/ nub byang rigs
217a3(tsa): sngags 'chang gi yul na/ srin mo 'phra men ma 'joms byed ma bya rog gi mgo can/ lag na spu gri ka ma la thogs nas/ bam chen po'i mgo bcad pa thogs shing za ba la/
217a4(tsa): lha mo mar me mar mas ka ka mu khar sprul nas/ brtul te gong ma bzhin du gzhug go// byang shar 'byung po mang po'i yul na/ srin mo 'gra men ma chu byed ma jug pa'i mgo nan+tu/
217a5(tsa): lcags kyu dang thod khrag thogs nas/ bam chen po'i tsita rku ba las/ g+ham+bo d+hi nab mas U lu mu khar ny+dza lA nas btulA~M te/ de bzhin du gzhag go/ srin mo'i/
217a6(tsa): lus dang gnas kyi phyi rol na// grong khyer chen po bzhi la shar phyogs kyi grong khyer tsa ka l-i byin/ mi'am ci'i srin mo rta mgo can lag na lcags kyu thogs te/ thams
217a7(tsa): cad 'dzin cing za ba las/ byams pa chen pos lcags kyu mar sprul nas btul te gzhag go// lho phyogs kyi grong khyer chen po ya ma yo ti na/ grul bum gyi srin mo pha mgo
217b1(tsa): can lag na zhags pa thogs te/ thams cad 'ching zhing za ba la/ snying rje chen mos zhags pa mar sprul te btul nas gzhag go// nub phyogs grong khyer ma ra ya na/ lto
217b2(tsa): 'phye'i srin mo dreng mgo can/ lag na lcags kyi dra ba thogs nas/ thams cad za ba las// dga' ba chen po'i nyi zla lcags sgrogs can gyi skur sprul nas btul te gzhag
217b3(tsa): go/ byang phyogs grong khyer chen po tsam ri na/ sha za'i srin mo spyang ki'i mgo can/ lag gnyis sder 'dzings su sbyar te/ thams cad sbyor cing za ba las/ btang
217b4(tsa): snyoms chen mo dril bu mar sprul nas btul te/ de bzhin du gzhag go// de'i phyi rim phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad na/ phyogs skyong srin po brgyad kyi bu mo 'bar
217b5(tsa): ma brgyad la/ shar phyogs dri za mang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grong khyer na// dri za'i rgyal po'i bu mo 'bar ma nyi ma'i zhags pa can lag na nyi zer gyi zhags pa thogs nas/
217b6(tsa): stong gsum mam khams gsum du 'dzin cing za ba las/ ston pa kun tu bzang po'i thugs las yi ge kra phyung / de las sbyor byed nyi zer zhags pa can du sprul nas/ de dang
217b7(tsa): spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas btul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod de/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du bran dang yang bran dang / g.yog dang yang
218a1(tsa): g.yog dang yang khol du dbang byin te gzhag go// de bzhin du shar lho'i drang srong mang po'i grong khyer na/ me lha ag ne'i bu mo 'bar ma me khyer glog
218a2(tsa): 'phreng 'dzin la/ yi dgas kyi thub pa kha 'bar mas/ spor byed me khyer glog 'dzin du sprul nas btul te/ gong ma bzhin du gzhag go// lho phyogs gshin rje mang po'i
218a3(tsa): grong khyer na/ gshin rje'i rgyal po'i bu mo 'bar ma gtum mo mdung thung 'phen la/ mi'i thub pa shAkya thub pas/ spor byed ma der sprul te btul lo// lho nub srin po mang
218a4(tsa): po'i grong khyer na/ srin po ni ri ti'i bu mo 'bar ma gshin rje ral gri'i sku la/ dmyal ba'i thub pas der sprul nas btul lo// nub phyogs chu lha mang po'i grong khyer na/ ba ru
218a5(tsa): na'i bu mo 'bar ma rdo rje dril 'khrol ma la/ chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo'i thugs las yi ge a byung / a las spor byed rdo rje dril 'khrol mar sprul nas btul lo// nub byang
218a6(tsa): gi phyogs mtshams rlung lha mang po'i grong khyer na/ rlung lha ba dan gyi bu mo 'bar ma gnod sbyin khyung thogs ma la/ lha'i thub pas spor byed ma der sprul nas btul lo// byang
218a7(tsa): phyogs gnod sbyin ku be ra'i grong khyer na/ gnod sbyin dbyug to can gyi bu mo 'bar ma thogs med skar mda'i gdong la/ lha ma yin gyi thub pas spor byed ma der sprul nas btul lo//
218b1(tsa): byang shar bgegs mang po gnas pa'i grong khyer na/ dbang ldan gyi bu mo 'bar ma ba glang sna la/ byol song gi thub pas spor ma 'bar ma 'jig rten glag sha rdebs su sprul nas btul
218b2(tsa): te de bzhin du gzhag go// srin po'i yul dang gnas kyi gru bzhi na/ bdud kyi bu mo za byed ma dang / rmongs byed ma dang // za ba rgyas 'debs ma dang / rmongs ma'i skem byed ma
218b3(tsa): la sogs pa bzhi la/ dpal chen po'i thugs gsang ba'i gzung ma bzhi las/ gsang ba'i yum chen mo bzhi la/ bde ba za byed ma dang / bde ba rmongs byed ma dang / bde ba rgyas
218b4(tsa): 'debs ma dang / bde ba tshe 'phel ma dang bzhir sprul nas/ de rnams kyi 'dod pa'i spyod pa dang / cha mthun par byas nas btul te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas// ma 'ong
218b5(tsa): pa'i don du gsang ba'i gzung ma'i g.yog dang yang g.yog la sogs pa'i dbang byin te gzhag go/ de nas srin po'i yul dang / gnas kyi phyi rol na/ srin po'i 'khor
218b6(tsa): dang mkha' 'gro ma sha khrag rus pa'i lhag sdung chen mo la/ phyogs bzhin bzhi bzhi/ mtshams bzhin gsum gsum/ sgo bzhin re re ste sum cu rtsa gnyis la/ sems dpa'
218b7(tsa): chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis btul te/ shar thal ba yod pa'i gling na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bzhi btul ba la dga' bar byed pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// mdog thal skya/ lag na
219a1(tsa): pad+mo lo ma dang chas par byas nas/ sems can thams cad dbang du sdud cing za ba las/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpas/ mkha' 'gro ma dga'
219a2(tsa): bar byed ma lag na rdo rje rtse gsum thogs par sprul te/ de dang spyod pa cha 'thun par byas nas/ thabs kyis btul te phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba'i don
219a3(tsa): dubran dang yang bran la sogs par dbang byin te gzhag go// de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma 'dren byed lag na lcags kyu thogs pa la/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal pos/ mkha'
219a4(tsa): 'gro ma 'dren byed mar sprul nas btul lo// de bzhin du sems dpa' chen po rdo rje legs pas/ mkha' 'gro ma gsod byed mar sprul nas/ srin po'i 'khor gsod byed skye na ma btul
219a5(tsa): to// sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chags pas/ mkha' 'gro ma spor byed mar sprul nas/ srin po'i 'khor gror bar byed pa btul lo// lho phyogs me tog bkram pa'i gling na
219a6(tsa): rin chen rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis btul ba'i mkha' 'gro ma la/ 'bar byed ma mdog sngo lag na me 'bar ba la/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin chen gyis mkha' 'gro ma
219a7(tsa): 'bar byed mar sprul nas btul te gong ma bzhin gzhag go/ de bzhin du rdo rje nyi mas srin po'i 'khor gzi brjid ma btul lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis khro gnyer ma btul lo//
219b1(tsa): rdo rje gnad mas 'joms byengs btum lo// nub grogs khrag gi rgya mchu' gling na/ srin po'i 'khor mkha' 'gro ma bzhil/ bad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis bcu
219b2(tsa): mkha' 'gro chags chen ma lagan pa d+mo gdings pa mdog dmar mol/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rna chos kyis/ mkha' 'gro mtshugs chen ma
219b3(tsa): ma // de shin du rnon pa rgyags rnal sa ba stsal// ngarna la la ma la khan mom 'dul so// rdorje sgrubs rgyas 'di bas mag// nga
219b4(tsa): sha'i phung po blangs pa'i myung ni/ srin po'i 'khor mkha' 'arlom pazhi lnga/ las kyi rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis btul blta/ mkha' 'gro tshigs lus mdog ser/
219b5(tsa): mgran mtshan gyi tham thogs pas/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lus kyis// mkha' 'gro sa tshogs lus mdog nga n+tu/ rdo rje rgya ma na thogs par sprul nas/
219b6(tsa): bzhin du bdus nas gzhag go// de bzhin du dur+b+hu go chas bzung ba mo brtul lo// rdo rje mche bas gnod sbyin mo brtul mo// rdo rje wa~M rgyud gyis yang dga'i thog sa brtul //
219b7(tsa): shar gyi mtshams na nang na tshogs grangs pa'i sloban/ phrin pa'i 'kho mkha' 'grom gsums/ mkha' 'gra bya rags gal gan rdzo thigs pa la/ sems dpa' chen pa
220a1(tsa): bar 'gro bas bya rog gi mgor sprul te/ lag na gri dang 'khar gzhong thogs pas spyod pa cha 'thun par byas nas btul te/ gong ma bzhin du gzhag go/
220a2(tsa): de bzhin du kun tu bzang po sa 'jigs byad ma btul lo// zla 'od gzhon nus 'ug mgo ma btul lo// lho nub tshil sna tshogs spungs pa'i gling na// srin po'i 'khor ma khawa3
220a3(tsa): 'gro ma gsum la/ sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong kun la skyong gis// mkha' 'gro bzhang mgo mar sprul nas/ srin po'i 'khor bzhad mgo ma btul lo// de bzhin du dra ba
220a4(tsa): can gyi 'od kyis khyi mgo ma btul lo// rdo rje snying pos phag mgo ma btul lo// nub byang zhag sna tshogs spungs pa'i gling na/ srin po'i 'khor mkha' 'gro ma gsum la/ sems
220a5(tsa): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis// mkha' 'gro rnga mo mgor sprul nas/ srin mo rnga mo'i mgo can btul lo// de bzhin du 'od dpag med kyis bong bu'i mgo can btul lo//
220a6(tsa): mya ngan kun 'joms kyis ra mgo ma btul lo// byung shar nang khrol dang ba su ta sna tshogs spungs pa'i gling na/ srin po'i 'khor mkha' 'gro ma gsum la/ sems dpa' chen
220a7(tsa): po rgyal ba'i ye shes tog gis/ mkha' 'gro ma byi la'i mgo can mar sprul nas/ srin mo byi la'i mgo can ma btul lo// de bzhin du blo gros mi zad pas keng rus dkar
220b1(tsa): po 'dzin pa btul lo// spobs pa brtsegs pas mkha' 'gro ma rus pa'i 'phreng ba can gong ma bzhin du btul lo// de rnams kyi sgo bzhi na/ shar na srin po
220b2(tsa): bum sna lhon gshin rje mda' sha dri ba la sogs pa bzhi ni/ gshin rje gshed po la sogs pa khro bo bzhis bsgral/ de rnams kyi chung ma bzhi gnas pa la/ byang phyogs kyi
220b3(tsa): sems dpa' chen po bzhis btul te/ shar phyogs kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa' ngan song kun tu 'dren gyis/ mkha' 'gro ma lcags kyur mar sprul nas/ shar phyogs srin
220b4(tsa): bopo bum rna'i chung ma/ lag na lcags kyi ku ku ra thogs pa dang spyod pa cha 'thun par byas te/ gong ma bzhin du btul nas gzhag go// sems dpa' chen po byams pa mi tri sa
220b5(tsa): mkha' 'gro ma zhags pa mar sprul nas/ lho sgor gshin rje rnam par 'joms pa'i chung ma lcags kyi thag pa 'phen ma btul lo// sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang pos//
220b6(tsa): mkha' 'gro ma lcags sgrog mar sprul nas/ nub sgor srin po'i rgyal po lang ka mgrin bcu'i chung ma lag na lcags kyi lu gu rgyud sdom pa btul lo// sems dpa' chen po don
220b7(tsa): yod grub pas/ mkha' 'gro rdo rje dril 'khrol mar sprul nas/ byang sgor gnod sbyin 'bod 'drog kyi chung ma/ lag na mi rkang gi gling bu thogs pa dang spyod pa cha 'thun par byas te
221a1(tsa): btul nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod de/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bran dang yang bran dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog tu dbang byin te/ las kyi
221a2(tsa): mkha' 'gro mar gzhag go// / de nas yang srin po'i yul dang gnas kyi phyogs bzhi bla 'og na/ sngon gsang sngags kyi don spyod tsam na// gzung 'dzin dang rtag
221a3(tsa): chad kyi lta ba sum brgya drug cu mthu rtas pa las// srin po'i pho nya dang phyag brnyan sum brgya drug cu las/ snyegs pa'i pho nya dang phyag brnyan gshog pa can brgya nyi shu/ 'dzin
221a4(tsa): paba'i pho nya dang phyag brnyan sder mo can brgya nyi shu/ gsod pa'i pho nya dang phyag brnyan mche ba can brgya nyi shu las/ phyogs bzhi bla 'og tu drug cu drug cu ba skye ste/ sems can
221a5(tsa): thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku las 'od zer bskye ste/ dkar po ser po dmar po ljang khu mthing ka rin po che'i kha dog la sogs
221a6(tsa): pa/ 'od zer re re la yang grangs bye ba khrag khrig drug drug cu drug cur spros te/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad bla 'og phyogs bcu thams cad/ 'od zer gyi snang ba chen pos khyab
221a7(tsa): par byas nas/ don bya ba dang / bskul bya ba dang / byi dor bya ba dang / snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'od zer de dag slar 'dus pa las/ mi mo sum brgya drug
221b1(tsa): cur gyur te/ shar phyogs nas dung gi mi mo drug cu/ lho nas lcags kyi mi mo drug cu/ nub phyogs nas zangs kyi mi mo drug cu// byang nas g.yu'i mi mo drug cu/ 'og nas
221b2(tsa): gser gyi mi mo drug cu/ steng nas bse'i mi mo drug cu de rnams kyang mthun par zhal gcig phyag bzhi bzhi ste/ g.yas kyi dang po skyegs byed kyi pho nya ga shog pa can bsam gyis
221b3(tsa): mi khyab pa bsnams pa/ 'og ma na 'dzin byed kyi pho nya sder mo can bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na sdom byed kyi pho nya mtshon cha can bsam gyis mi khyab pa
221b4(tsa): bsnams pa/ tha ma sgrol byed kyi pho nya mche ba can bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsnams pa/ de lta bu dngos sum brgya drug cu la// don gyi bye ba khrag khrig dang ldan pa'o// de dag
221b5(tsa): gi myur ba ni glog gis kyang bskyod du med pa/ mgyogs pa rlung gis kyang bskyod du med pa/ gnyen pos mi tshugs pa rdo rje pha lam gyis bskyod du med pa/ ci la yang thogs pa
221b6(tsa): med pa sha stag go// de la shar phyogs nas me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rtags// 'od dkar po las rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya dung gi mi mo drug cu// sku dang / gsung
221b7(tsa): dang / thugs dang / rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra rba na rba na a gu sha dza/ zhes drug cu tham pa brjod pas/ pho nya rdo rje 'bar ma dang / rdo rje sder mo dang / rdo rje ki la ya dang /
222a1(tsa): rdo rje 'bigs ma dang / rdo rje ro langs dang / rdo rje drag mo dang / rdo rje mgyog ma dang / rdo rje gtum mo dang / rdo rje 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje gsal
222a2(tsa): ma dang / rdo rje sdom ma dang // rdo rje 'gugs ma dang / rdo rje thogs med dang / rdo rje bskyod ma dang / rdo rje 'chang bdag dang / rdo rje 'phra men dang / rdo rje myur byed ma dang /
222a3(tsa): rdo rje skul byed ma dang / rdo rje gsal bkra ma dang // rdo rje yang dag dang / rdo rje rtse dang / rdo rje gnon pa dang / rdo rje dbang phyug dang / rdo rje rin mo dang / rdo rje kha 'a bar ma dang /
222a4(tsa): rdo rje gsal bkram dang / rdo rje khro mo dang / rdo rje 'chang ma dang / rdo rje gtum mo dang / rdo rje khros ma dang / rdo rje las byed ma dang / rdo rje dus mtshams dang / rdo rje thar ma
222a5(tsa): dang / rdo rje skul dang / rdo rje dpal 'bar ma dang / rdo rje skyong chen ma dang / rdo rje lus khro ma dang / rdo rje ngag khro ma dang / rdo rje yid gtum ma dang / rdo rje rjer chen ma
222a6(tsa): dang / rdo rje gsod byed ma dang / rdo rje brlang ba dang / rdo rje gsod mo dang / rdo rje zab mo dang / rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / rdo rje 'chang ba mo dang / rdo rje tshe ling ma dang /
222a7(tsa): rdo rje mdangs len ma dang / rdo rje srog 'phrog ma dang / rdo rje snying 'byin ma dang / rdo rje gcod byed ma dang / rdo rje skul byed ma dang / rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs dang / rdo rje skyon
222b1(tsa): pa dang / rdo rje 'jug byed ma dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog ma dang / rdo rje kun ma dang / rdo rje rdzu byed ma dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed ma dang / rdo rje bcud len ma dang / drug cu yang
222b2(tsa): sprul pa mche ba can drug cu 'brengs pas// srin po shar phyogs kyi pho nya drug cu dang spyod pa mthun par byas te/ pho nya rnams la smras pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams srin po'i
222b3(tsa): pho nya byed pa de/ rtogs pa ci dang ldan// don cis byed/ pho nya rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi rje bos bdag cag rnams la pho nyar dbang byin te/ las dang mthur ldan
222b4(tsa): pas sems can thams cad dgugs pa'i pho nya bgyid pa la sogs pa/ rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mos smras pa/ sems can la yang nga rung ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yong
222b5(tsa): la/ tshogs bsogs pa la gnas pa dang / dge ba bcu la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// dkon mchog gsum gyi sku dgrar gyur cig/ ngan pa'i ngang tshul can
222b6(tsa): bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa rnams ni// ma bkug cing ma bsgral na nyams pa chen po'i rgyur 'gyur pas snying rje chen pos zin par byas la// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du
222b7(tsa): bcug cing drangs la/ lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs la/ gnyis su med pa'i ngang du bya'o// zhes smras pa/ pho nya de dag thams cad dga' ches te/ de bzhin
223a1(tsa): du bgyi'o zhes khas blangs te mna' bor te/ bran dang yan bran du dbang byin te 'khor du gzhag go// de nas nub phyogs na so sor
223a2(tsa): rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi rtags 'od zer dmar po las/ pad+mo rigs kyi pho nya mo zangs kyi mi mo drug cu sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gar dza ga
223a3(tsa): dza po ta baM/ zhes drug cu brjod pa las/ pad+mo thog 'bebs ma dang / pad+ma 'brug sgrog ma dang / pad+ma char 'bebs ma dang / pad+ma mo 'od 'gyed ma dang //
223a4(tsa): pad+ma bkrag gsal ma dang / pad+ma gzha' mtshon ma dang / pad+ma 'od 'phro ma dang / pad+ma 'od gsal ma dang / pad+ma khrag 'thung ma dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang
223a5(tsa): phyug ma dang / pad+ma sa bdag ma dang / pad+ma 'gugs byed ma dang / pad+ma kar sham ma dang / pad+ma sgra sgrog ma dang / pad+ma yid gzhung ma dang / pad+ma lhan
223a6(tsa): mdzes pa dang / pad+ma sems 'phrog ma dang / pad+ma bdud rtsi 'bebs ma dang / pad+ma mgyog byed ma dang / pad+ma gsod byed ma dang / pad+ma snying 'byin ma dang /
223a7(tsa): pad+ma dmar thung ma dang / pad+ma rkang 'jib ma dang / pad+ma las byed ma dang / pad+ma zhags thogs ma dang / pad+ma bla 'phrog ma dang / pad+ma thogs byed ma dang /
223b1(tsa): pad+ma za byed ma dang / pad+ma smyos byed ma dang / pad+ma rmugs byed ma dang / pad+ma rdzu byed ma dang / pad+ma 'khrug byed ma dang / pad+ma drag mo dang / pad+ma brkam ma dang //
223b2(tsa): pad+ma 'joms byed ma dang / pad+ma dga' ma dang / pad+ma 'dzin ma dang / pad+ma glog 'gyu ma dang / pad+ma g.yul 'joms ma dang / pad+ma lha 'brel ma dang /
223b3(tsa): pad+ma srog 'brel ma dang / pad+ma myur byed ma dang / pad+ma rings byed ma dang / pad+ma srog byed ma dang // pad+ma glog byed ma dang / pad+ma tho ba ma dang / pad+ma gtun khung
223b4(tsa): ma dang / pad+ma zhag sa 'phen ma dang / pad+ma me khyer ma dang / pad+ma sdud byed ma dang / pad+ma g.yeng byed ma dang / pad+ma bdud 'joms ma dang // pad+ma dpa la mo dang /
223b5(tsa): pad+ma dbang phyug ma dang / pad+ma grag mo dang / pad+ma gtum bag can dang / pad+ma ka la ma dang / pad+ma sde tshogs dang / pad+ma ma hA la mdong dang / pad+ma rab brjid ma
223b6(tsa): dang / drug cu rnams kyang sbrul gshog pa can drug cu 'gab na 'brengs pas/ srin po'i nub phyogs kyi pho nya drug cu dang spyod pa mthun par byas te/ gong ma de bzhin
223b7(tsa): dam mnos dbang byin te gzhag go// de nas lho phyogs mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rtags 'od zer mthing ka las/ rin po che rigs kyi pho nya ma lcags
224a1(tsa): kyi mi mo drug cu sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ha la ha la pa sha hUM/ drug cu las/ rin chen dbang phyug ma dang / rin
224a2(tsa): chen mkha' 'gro ma dang // rin chen mthu'i bebs ma dang / rin chen srab mo dang / rin chen mchongs ma dang // rin chen khro gtum ma dang // rin chen brtson byed ma dang /
224a3(tsa): rin chen 'jig ma dang // rin chen sha za ma dang // rin chen khrag 'thung ma dang // rin chen so gcig ma dang / rin chen ral gsig ma dang / rin chen 'khrug byed ma
224a4(tsa): dang / rin chen 'dzul byed ma dang // rin chen myug byed ma dang / rin chen mthu mo che dang // rin chen nag mo che dang // rin chen rtog med ma dang // rin chen rtogs 'joms
224a5(tsa): ma dang / rin chen yongs ma dang // rin chen sna tshogs lus dang / rin chen sra ba mo dang / rin chen sdod cig ma dang // rin chen dur khrod ma dang / rin chen dbyings
224a6(tsa): phyug ma dang / rin chen bde 'gro ma dang // rin chen rgyas byed ma dang / rin chen 'dzom byed ma dang / rin chen khrag gis myos ma dang / rin chen rnga ma 'dzin ma dang /
224a7(tsa): rin chen mgyogs byed ma dang / rin chen snum ma dang / rin chen mdung thung sder dang / rin chen 'gyur ma dang / rin chen thog 'bebs ma dang / rin chen spos med ma dang
224b1(tsa): rin chen 'khrug byed ma dang / rin chen dbang phyug ma dang / rin chen ka ya ma dang / rin chen gsal bkra ma dang // rin chen mkha' bsgyur ma dang / rin chen sgrol ma dang /
224b2(tsa): rin chenar ro ma dang // rin chen khrag 'thung ma dang / rin chen 'bar ma dang // rin chen mi bzad ma dang // rin chen 'phrog byed ma dang / rin chen sgrol byed ma dang / rin chen
224b3(tsa): sna tshogs stobs dang // rin chen yid 'phrog ma dang // rin chen srog len ma dang // rin chen bcud len ma dang // rin chen tshe rkun ma dang // rin chen dbang mo che dang / rin
224b4(tsa): chen drag 'joms ma dang / rin chen sdud byed ma dang // rin chen glang 'dzin ma dang / rin chen srog 'dzin ma dang / rin chen tsa 'gro ma dang / rin chen snas 'byin ma dang /
224b5(tsa): rin chen snas stod ma la sogs pa drug cu rnams/ yang sprul dmigs pa'i mgo can drug cus 'gram nas 'breng ba/ srin po'i lho phyogs kyi pho nya drug cu dang spyod pa cha 'thun
224b6(tsa): par byas te/ thabs sna tshogs kyis btul nas/ gong ma bzhin du dam mnos te bran du dbang byin nas gzhag go// de nas byang phyogs nas bya ba nan tan gyi ye
224b7(tsa): shes kyi rtags 'od zer ljang khu las/ las kyi rigs kyi pho nya ma g.yu'i mi mo drug cu sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pa tsa pa tsa gan d+ha ho// drug cu las/
225a1(tsa): las rdo rje ma dang / las 'joms ma chen mo dang / las kha lo 'dul ma dang / las dbang phyug ma dang / las grub byed ma dang / las la skul
225a2(tsa): ma dang / las grub pa mo dang / las mthar phyin pa mo dang / las chud mi za ba dang / las dbang sgyur ma dang / las thogs byed ma dang / las grub pa mo dang / las
225a3(tsa): gsal byed ma dang / las byed dbang byed ma dang / las kyi dam tshig ma dang / las kyi byar ma dang / las kyi ltang 'dzin ma dang / las kyi ltang gcod ma dang / las kyi
225a4(tsa): ga la 'dzin ma dang / las kyi skul byed ma dang / las kyi byar mo dbang mo dang / las kyi bya ra mo phag mo dang / las kyi bya ra mo spyan brgya mo dang / las kyi byar mo
225a5(tsa): mig stong ldan dang / las kyi byar mo 'od 'gyogs ma dang / las kyi byar mo rlung zhon ma dang / las rdzu 'phrul can dang / las sgrub mo dang / las dbang phyug rgyal mo
225a6(tsa): dang / las grags rgyal ma dang / las dpal sham ma dang / las yakra mo dang / las khro bag can dang / las che ba mo dang / las dbang bskur ma dang / las
225a7(tsa): dngos grub bdag mo dang / las sgrol byed chen mo dang / las thams cad kyi bdag mo dang / las 'od 'phro ma dang / las drag mo dang / las khro skyen mo dang / las
225b1(tsa): myur grub ma dang / las chud ma zos pa dang / las 'dul byed ma dang / las rgya mtsho dang / las ltang 'dzin ma dang / las kyi sgrol byed ma dang / las 'dul mkhas
225b2(tsa): ma dang las la goms ma dang / las la mkhas ma dang / las kyi dbang bsgyur ma dang / las kyi mchog sgrol ma dang / las kyi rgyu sgrol ma dang / las kyi
225b3(tsa): rngam pa mo dang / las spro skyen mo dang / las gtum chen mo dang / las mig dmar me dang / las sen mo can dang / drug cu rnams kyang yang sprul sder mo can gyi tshogs drug
225b4(tsa): cu bgab nas 'breng bas/ srin po'i byang phyogs kyi pho nya drug cu dang cha 'thun par byas te/ de rnams btul nas dam phog nas dbang byin te gzhag go// de nas dbus
225b5(tsa): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rtags 'od zer ser po las/ gser gyi mi mo drug cu khro bo dang khro mor sprul te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // kro d+ha kro tihUM
225b6(tsa): phaT/ drug cu las/ khro bo chen po bi dza yA dang / khro mo chen mo rdo rje rnam bsnyems ma dang / khro bo chen po dbyug pa chen mo dang / khro mo chen mo rdo rje sder mo can dang / khro bo
225b7(tsa): chen po ya man ta ka dang / khro mo chen mo rdo rje dur khrod ma dang / khro bo chen po mi g.yo mgon po dang / khro mo chen mo rdo rje gtun khung mo dang / khro bo chen po rta mgrin dang / khro mo
226a1(tsa): chen mo rdo rje gtum mo dang / khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa thams cad dang / khro mo chen mo mda' snyems ma dang / khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil
226a2(tsa): pa dang / khro mo chen mo rlung 'byin ma dang / khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro mo chen mo gsod byed ma dang / khro bo chen po ma hA pa la dang / khro mo chen
226a3(tsa): mo bskyed chen mo dang / khro bo chen po hUM ka ra dang / khro mo chen mo sgra 'byin ma dang / khro bo chen po badz+ra ki la ya dang / khro mo chen mo rgyal chen mo dang / khro bo chen po sme brtsegs
226a4(tsa): dang / khro mo chen mo 'dam 'byin ma dang / khro bo chen po badz+rA yak+ka dang / khro mo chen mo sa ma ya shwa ri dang / khro bo chen po dmar nag dang / khro mo chen mo dbang sgyur ma dang /
226a5(tsa): khro bo chen po badz+ra 'ba' ta la dang / khro mo chen mo rdo rje zag mo dang / khro bo chen po su su ti ka ra ta dang / khro mo 'bar 'jigs ma dang / khro bo chen po shrI mahA kA la dang /
226a6(tsa): khro mo chen mo ral pa 'grengs ma dang / khro bo mi 'chi thabs sbyor dang / khro mo 'joms byed chen mo dang / khro bo chen po las thams cad pa dang / khro mo las kun 'grub ma
226a7(tsa): dang / khro bo chen po rab rngams dang / khro mo chen mo gtum mo dang / khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum snang dang / khro mo chen mo mi 'pham ma dang / khro bo chen po 'jig rten
226b1(tsa): gsum 'dul dang / khro mo chen mo lcags kyu ma dang / khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum 'jigs dang / khro mo chen mo khro gnyer ma dang / khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum 'ching
226b2(tsa): dang / khro mo chen mo zhags pa ma dang / khro bo chen po pad+ma rgyal dang / khro mo chen mo ro langs ma dang / khro bo chen po be con sngon po dang / khro mo chen mo lcags sgrog ma dang /
226b3(tsa): khro bo chen po ka ni badz+ra dang / khro mo chen mo ral gcig ma dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje go cha dang / khro mo chen mo dril bu dang / khro bo chen po rnga ma chen dang / khro mo chen mo dbang
226b4(tsa): sdud ma dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje tho ba dang / khro mo chen mo za byed ma dang / drug cu rnams kyang yang sprul mgo brnyan ma dang / 'phra men ma dang / khra thabs nyi shu
226b5(tsa): gcig tshogs drug cu bgab nas 'brengs pas/ srin po dbus kyi pho nya dang / steng gi pho nya srin po pho mo drug cu dang spyod pa mthun par byas te/ de rnams btul
226b6(tsa): nas bran dang yang bran du dbang byin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod de/ dam byin dbang pog ste gzhag go// de nas mtha' dang 'og med pa
226b7(tsa): chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi rtag sa 'od mthing nag las/ bse'i mi mo drug cu sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mA ma mA ma
227a1(tsa): b+h+yo b+h+yo/ drug cu las mA mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma dang / smras pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / dur khrod tshogs kyi ma mo chen mo dang / za byed rngam
227a2(tsa): pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / khams gsum sdud pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / rgyu drug sgrol ba'i ma mo chen mo dang / srid gsum za ba'i ma mo chen mo dang / yongs la dbang
227a3(tsa): sgyur sgyu'i ma mo chen mo dang / mthu dpung bskyed du med pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / sha khrag gsu ra la dga' ba'i ma mo chen mo dang / nang khrol glo snying 'byin pa'i ma mo
227a4(tsa): chen mo dang / za byed tshe srog 'phrog pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / rngam chen mchod la dga' ba'i ma mo dang / 'dzin byed zhal du stobs pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / bgegs
227a5(tsa): chen snying la 'debs pa'i ma mo chen mo dang / zhing bcu gtan nas len pa'i ma mo dang / dam nyams snying la 'debs pa'i ma mo dang / 'byung po sgrol ba'i ma mo
227a6(tsa): dang / gshin rje sgrol ba'i ma mo chen mo dang / sa klu sgrol ba'i ma mo dang / gnod sbyin sgrol ba'i me mo dang // srin po sgrol ba'i ma mo dang // srin mo sgrol ba'i
227a7(tsa): ma mo dang / gzugs chen len pa'i ma mo dang / khrag 'thung ba'i ma mo dang / drod 'phrog pa'i ma mo dang / dbugs len pa'i ma mo dang / srog 'phrog pa'i ma mo
227b1(tsa): dang mdangs 'jibs pa'i ma mo dang / bya rgod mgo'i ma mo dang / stag sgyug ma'i ma mo dang / chu srin kha'i ma mo dang / dur khrod rgyan gyi ma mo dang / rdo rje gar
227b2(tsa): gyi ma mo dang / pad+ma gar gyi ma mo dang / sa bdag dbang phyug ma mo dang / ri rab rtse nas snyil ba'i ma mo dang / rgya mtsho gting nas skems pa'i ma mo dang / rdo rje tho ba'i
227b3(tsa): ma mo dang / rdo rje gtun khung gi ma mo dang / rdo rje dur khrod bdag gi ma mo dang / rdo rje 'deg pa mo'i ma mo dang / rdo rje gsal bkra ma'i ma mo dang / rdo rje khrag
227b4(tsa): 'thung ma'i ma mo dang / ri lung dre'u zhon pa'i ma mo dang / dus bzhi'i rgyal mo 'joms pa'i ma mo dang / khyi spyang gcan du sprul pa'i ma mo dang / stag dom dred
227b5(tsa): ltar rdzu ba'i ma mo dang / 'dzum byed khra ltar lding ba'i ma mo dang / ri rlung med par khebs pa'i ma mo dang / ngal dub med par rgyug pa'i ma mo dang / gtsang sme
227b6(tsa): med par sgrol ba'i ma mo dang / ya byin ra la dkar 'tshong ba'i ma mo dang / ba se'i 'byin tsal mo che'i ma mo dang / phag byin thogs pa med pa'i ma mo dang /
227b7(tsa): de phyin grub ma mo'i ma mo dang / tshe srog kun la dbang sgyur ma mo dang / g.ya' ri gangs la rten pa'i ma mo dang / 'brog sprin skyes pa 'dul ba'i ma mo dang //
228a1(tsa): 'khro tshog myur bar brtson pa'i ma mo dang / drug cu rnams ni yang sprul bud med brda'i mi phrad pa/ pa Na tshe ba bzlog dka' ba/ 'khor drug
228a2(tsa): cu drug cur 'brengs pas// srin po'i mgo dang mtha'i pho nya byed pa'i srin mo drug cu dang cha lugs 'thun par byas te/ srin mo rnams la smras pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams
228a3(tsa): ni srin po'i pho nya byed cing // sems can thams cad bkug bcing bsgral nas/ sha khrag rus pa za zhing 'dug pa de don ched ci yod/ rtog pa ci dang ldan zhes pa dang /
228a4(tsa): srin mo rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi jo bo bdud ru dra chen po khams gsum la dbang sgyur bas pho nyar dbang stsal te/ sems can thams cad 'gugs shing bsgral
228a5(tsa): ba'i pho nya bgyi 'tshal ba las/ don ched dang rtogs pa gzhan ma mchis so// grogs mo dag rtogs pa dang don ci mchis/ ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag rnams
228a6(tsa): ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ bdag dang gzhan bsgral nas bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por 'don pa'o// srin mo rnams kyis smras pa/ rtogs pa dang don ched de lta bu dang
228a7(tsa): ldan pas e ma a la la la/ bdag cag rnams la de ma 'tshal ba yang 'gyod na/ de da rung rtogs pa ma 'byongs shing // 'jig rten gyi chal ma rten pas 'tshal ba ma mchis
228b1(tsa): so// ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ de 'tshal ba yang ma mchis la/ rtogs pa dang don ched du ldan par byos shig/ gang zag dge bcu dang ldan pa dang / rtsa ba dang yan lag gi
228b2(tsa): dam tshig bsrung ba ma gtogs so// dam tshig bdag dang mi ldan zhing de dag nyams pa rnams ni yid kyis mi bsgral du mi rung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nas ngan song 'khor ba'i
228b3(tsa): rgyu sog cing mnar med par 'gro bas// de dag rtogs pa dang / snying rjer lhan cing bsgral la/ bdag nyid chen por longs spyod par bya'o// zhes smras pa dang / srin mo
228b4(tsa): thams cad dga' ches te/ de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khas blangs dam mnos bro bor te/ bran dang yang bran dang / khol dang yang kho la dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog tu dbang
228b5(tsa): byin te/ phyi'i dam tshig dkar po'i 'khor bsrung ba dang / nang gi rnal 'byor dam tshig gi don bsgrub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i bka' bsrung zhing // rang gi
228b6(tsa): dam tshig las mi 'da' bar zhal gyis ches g.yar gyis blangs te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i don du pho nya sum brgya drug cur mtshan
228b7(tsa): btags te gzhag go/ de nas yang 'jig rten gyi khams na/ srin po'i pho nya mo srin mo chen mo nad gtong zhing sha za ba bdun la/ srin mo chen mo brkam
229a1(tsa): ma dang / srin mo chen mo rab tu brkam ma dang / srin mo chen mo drim 'don pa dang / srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma dang / srin mo chen mo gsang
229a2(tsa): gzhi ma dang / srin mo chen mo skul byed ma dang / srin mo chen mo myos byed ma dang / ma bdun gyis nang dang rims rnam pa sna tshogs pa btang ste/ sems can ril kha 'dogs
229a3(tsa): pa dang / dpal chen po'i thugs ye shes kyi sprul pa las yi ge hUM bdun phyung / yi ge hUM bdun las gsang ba'i ma bdun byung ste/ rdo rje hUM grags ma dang / rdo rje kun gas
229a4(tsa): mA dang / rdo rje kun tu bzang mo dang / rdo rje chen mo ye shes mchog dang / rdo rje 'dod tshugs ma dang / rdo rje 'od gsal m+b+ha dang / rdo rje gsuM sgron ral gcigs dang bdun
229a5(tsa): de rnams dang rgyu ba thun par sprul// na nam+b+ha pA m+b+ha tshogs pa bAd+d+ha// gang cas na nga ba'i rngam ci yang med par mams can mang po bas pa
229a6(tsa): bsad pa tsam na bsad pa'i ngo bo ci yang med par byas te/ srin mo rnams kyi mthu zil gyis mnan nas/ srin mo rnams la smras pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams nad rnam
229a7(tsa): ba sna tshogs pa gtong zhing / sems can rnams kyi sha khrag brkam pa de/ las ci'i dbang gi rtsa ba yin/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i gnas su bskal pa dpag tu
229b1(tsa): med par mi ltung ngam/ srin mo bdun gyis smras pa/ bdag cag rnams ni dang po pha dang mas zas su sems can thams cad kyi sha khrag bskos la/ lag char nad kyi rkyal pa
229b2(tsa): gtad pa las/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba'i don ni ma rig go/ grogs mo dag 'di ltar spyod pa'i don dang gtan tshigs ci mchis// ma bdun gyis smras pa/ kho bo
229b3(tsa): cag ni don chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang la gnas pas/ dug dang bdud rtsir dbyer med pa la/ 'khrul pas phyin ci log gi lam du khrid pas// sems can dmyal bar skye nges
229b4(tsa): pas/ de dag thabs dang snying rjer ldan pas/ 'khor ba dang ngan song du mi gtang zhing bla na med pa'i lam la bkod pa las/ log pa'i lam du'ang bstan pa ma yin no zhes
229b5(tsa): pa dang / srin mo rnams 'jigs skrag nas 'di skad ces smras so// e ma'o gti mug rang dbang gis// ngan song gsum du skye nges pas/ skyob pa'i thugs rje ci zhig
229b6(tsa): mnga'// 'di la bskyab pa'i mthu mnga' na// bka' nyan dam nod 'bangs su mchi// 'tshal ba'i zas skal gang la bgyi// 'dren pa khyed kyis bshang du gsol//
229b7(tsa): ma bdun gyis smras pa/ sngar nyes pa dran pa rnams kyang rjes su 'gyod pa legs so// slan chad kyang de lta bu ba ba chol ma byed par dam du chos la/ slan chad kyang sdom par zung
230a1(tsa): zhig/ khyed kyi zas skal ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkar po'i phyogs dang / dam la gnas pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// nag po'i phyogs dang dam
230a2(tsa): la mi gnas shing / zhing bcur gyur pa'i brnag pa de kho na rnams so zhes pa dang / srin mo rnams rab tu dga' mgu yi rangs te/ de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khas blangs dam mnos
230a3(tsa): te/ bran dang yang bran du mna' bor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang 'khor skyong bar gzhag go// a ti/ 'gu rgyas ma ya/ rdzogs so// /
230a4(tsa): / de nas yang bdud kyi gling bzhi la/ shar phyogs kyi gling na dri za'i mgyogs ma dang / lho gshin rje'i mgyogs ma dang / nub klu'i mgyogs ma dang / byang gnod
230a5(tsa): sbyin gyi mgyogs ma dang bzhis/ srin po'i gsang ba'i gzungs ma bzhi byas te/ shin tu chags pa rang ka mas/ sems can thams cad yid slu zhing chags pa'i dbang gis srog
230a6(tsa): dang 'bral bar byed pa las// dpal chen po'i thugs gsang ba'i yum dkar mo mig gcig rgyas 'debs ma dang / bde ba rmongs byed ma dang / bde ba za byed ma dang / bde ba che/
230a7(tsa): 'phel ma dang bzhis// de rnams dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas nas/ mthu dpung zil gyis mnan nas btul te// de rnams la smras pa/ khyed rnams chags pa'i
230b1(tsa): dbang gis sems can thams cad bslu zhing srog dang 'bral bar byed pa de/ ngan song gsum gyi gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ram zhes pa dang / mgyogs ma bzhis smras pa/
230b2(tsa): grogs mo dag de ltar byed pa ci lags/ yum bzhis smras pa/ kho mo cag ni dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i don la chags tsam na/ chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin
230b3(tsa): pas nyon mongs pa dang gzung 'dzin la 'chol ba la sogs pa/ sdug bsngal gyi srog dang 'bral ba yin no zhes pa de bzhin du ngo mtshar du gyur nas// de bzhin bgyid lags
230b4(tsa): pas/ bdag cag rnams la de'i dbye ba dang rim pa gang lags pa bka' stsal du gsol// yum pazhis smras pa/ chags par bya ba'i yul ni ye shes kyi dbyings rtogs
230b5(tsa): pa des/ ma dang / sring mo dang / bu mo la sogs pa gang la yang mi rtog cing // rtog pa med pa'i chos nyid du mkhyen pa las ma gtogs pa/ phal pa rnams ni chags par bya
230b6(tsa): ba'i yul ma yin la/ 'khor ba las bslu ba'i chags pa'i yul ni// ma rig pa phal pa yid dang mthun par bya zhing // chags pa med pa dang / srog dang 'bral ba yang /
230b7(tsa): gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa'i dge ba'i phyogs dang / dam tshig la gnas shing bsrung ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams ni// rdo rje rigs kyi spun dang ming sring yin pas brtse
231a1(tsa): gdung dang mi 'bral ba'i srog gi lu gu rgyud byas pa las/ de rnams la srog gi bar chad lta ci smos kyis/ de'i bka' las zur tsam yang 'gal
231a2(tsa): 1na/ srog gi bar chad du gyur nas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de la srog dang mi 'bral du mi rung ba gang zhe na/ sdig pa'i phyogs la brten pa dang /
231a3(tsa): dam la mi gnas shing mi bsrung ba dang / de dag mnos nas nyams par 'gyur ba la ni/ srog dang ma phral na ngan song dang mi khom pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur pas// dam
231a4(tsa): 'di bzhin du gnas shing dmod long zhig/ de rnams kyis dmod btsugs pa// rnal 'byor pa bka' dang dam la gnas pa rnams ni bdag cag gi bsgo ba brtse zhing gdung
231a5(tsa): ba srid bzhi'i tshogs bgyid de/ bka' dang dam las 'gal ba rnams la srog dang dbral bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du ma bgyis na bdag cag rnams kyi lus srog tshig
231a6(tsa): par gyur cig ces dam bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje theg pa'i bka' dang bstan pa bsrung ba dang / 'khor bsrung bar dbang byin te/ sring mo bzhir ming btags
231a7(tsa): te gzhag go// de nas yang srin mo'i 'khor las kyi ging bco brgyad la/ bdud lha yor thom dang / bdud pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / bdud mo brgya byin kun
231b1(tsa): dga' mo dang / tshangs ba dung gi thor tshugs can dang / gnam sa gnyis kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus dang / ma bdud rgyal mo dang / rta zhon rgya gzhi dang /
231b2(tsa): dmu bdud ba rlam pa dang / tshangs pa'i the'u brang dang / 'brog srin mgo dgu dang / shar phyogs nas khams gsum gyi bdag po dang / srin gyi sgron ma dang / rdo rje
231b3(tsa): mchu dang / byin ya ka dang / lha mo nag mo dang / nam gru dang / gshin rje'i rgyal mo dmigs pa mgo dang / shel gyi srog bdag la sogs pa bco brgyad kyis/
231b4(tsa): khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad sgrol ba 'ba' zhig byed pa las/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po zhal bzhad pa'i sprul pa las/ rdo rje ging bco brgyad du
231b5(tsa): sprul te/ de rnams kyang gang zhe na/ dpa' bo chen po las rnams kun byed pa dang / khro mo chen mo khams gsum dbang sdud ma dang // rdo rje ging kar dang / rdo rje gnod
231b6(tsa): sbyin dang / rdo rje sbyang ki dang / rdo rje gshin rje dang // rdo rje rol pa dang / rdo rje 'chi bdag dang // rdo rje dus mtshams dang / rdo rje ro langs dang / rdo rje 'joms ma
231b7(tsa): dang / dbang sdud lcags kyus 'dren pa chen mo dang / khams gsum g.yab mos 'debs pa chen mo dang / gzugs med rlung ltar gyur pa chen mo dang / gar gyi glog ltar
232a1(tsa): sgyur ba chen mo dang / sbod gtong len par byed pa chen mo dang / rna ba nyan bram zer ba chen mo dang / srid gsum sgrol bar byed pa chen mo dang /
232a2(tsa): za byed chen mo ma ste bco brgyad du sprul nas/ de rnams dang spyod pa cha mthun par byas te/ bgegs bco brgyad po la smras pa/ khyed la sogs pa rnams sems can thams cad
232a3(tsa): kyi sgrol ba'i ging 'ba' zhig byed pa don ched ci yod/ thabs ci yod// snying rje ci dang ldan/ ngan song gsum du mi skye 'am zhes pa dang / bgegs rnams kyis smras pa/
232a4(tsa): bdag cag rnams ni sngon nas pha mas sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i ging gyis shig par dbang bskur ba las/ thabs dang snying rje ma mchis so// grogs po dag thabs dang
232a5(tsa): snying rje ci dang ldan// ngan song gsum zhes pa ci lta bu zhes pa dang / ging rnams kyis smras pa/ de lta bu'i nyon mongs pa dang / gdos pa can ni shin tu 'khrul pa ste//
232a6(tsa): don ched ni sems can ma rig pa rnams rig par bya ba dang / rtog pa can rnams sun dbyung ba'i don ched yin la/ snying rje ni ma rtogs pa'i dbang gis log pa'i phyogs mtha'
232a7(tsa): dag byas pas/ shin tu sdug bsngal yanga'i gnas su skyes pa de bu gcig pa la ma byams pa dang 'dra bar bskyed la/ thabs kyis snying rje'i sar mi gzhag par/ de nyid
232b1(tsa): mthu dang thabs kyis bsgral te/ bla na med pa'i sa la bkod pa'i ched du bstan la/ de dang mi ldan pa rnams ni dmyal ba yi dgas byol song la sogs pa/ shin tu mi
232b2(tsa): bzad pa'i yang ba las thon par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa dang / bgegs rnams kyis smras pa/ e ma a la la la de bzhin du bdag cag rnams kyang bgyid pas/ mthu dang
232b3(tsa): thabs kyis mngon sum du bsgral ba'i dmigs dang / mi bsgral ba gang lags pa de dbang dang dam tshig stsal du stsol/ ging rnams kyis smras pa/ bsgral ba'i dmigs
232b4(tsa): ni thugs rje'i dpyang thag chad de/ zhe sdang log pa'i lam dgu la zhugs pa dang / nyon mongs pa rang ka mas dbang byas te/ zhing bcur gyur nas/ log pa'i las
232b5(tsa): mtha' dag byed pa dang / gsang ba'i theg pa'i skra dgrar gyur pa dang // sems can tshe zad cing dus la bab pa rnams sgrol bar gyur cig/ gang zhig rnal 'byor
232b6(tsa): pa gzhung dang 'thun pa lta ci smos kyi/ 'gal ba med pa'i sems can tshe ma zad pa rnams ni ma sgrol cig ces pa dang / bgegs kyi rigs rnams dga' mgu yi rangs
232b7(tsa): nas/ de bzhin bgyi'o zhes khas blangs// dam bcas/ dmod por// mna' bskyal te/ bstan pa 'jig pa'i phyi'i dgra bo thams cad sgrol cig par/ phyi'i
233a1(tsa): ging bco brgyad du dbang byin te gzhag go// / de nas ru dra dregs pa chen po dang bcas pa rnams bsgral te/ khog pa dur khrod kyi
233a2(tsa): gzhal yas khang du brtsigs/ rnam par shes pa 'og min gyi yum gyi mkha' la gnas sbar te thugs kyi sras su byas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod/ 'khor ci gyi
233a3(tsa): bka' nyan thams cad dbang du bsdus te/ bran dang yang g.yog tu bgyis te/ ru dra dang dregs pa'i phyogs thams cad ming yang mi grag cing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
233a4(tsa): yun ring du mnyan par gnas te/ chos nyid yum gyi mkha' bde ba chen po na// dgyes pa chen po'i lhun la rtag par bzhugs pa la// blo'i khyad par gyis so sor
233a5(tsa): mthong zhing rtogs te/ la las byang chub kyi shing drung rtsar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ bdud rnam bzhi rim kyis btul nas/ dregs pa thams
233a6(tsa): cad zhi ba'i ting 'dzin gyis btul nas/ le lo can dang / rtag pa sun dbyung ba'i phyir/ thabs kyis mya ngan las 'das par tshul bstan nas// sangs
233a7(tsa): rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas shing // sems can thams cad bde ba la dgod par mthong zhing rtogs pa dang / la las ri rab kyi zom la phyag na rdo rjes
233b1(tsa): ye shes kyi rdo rje gsol te/ lha ma yin thams cad sngangs skrag nas/ srid pa gsum yang 'dar zhing g.yos te/ mdong gsol du rang rang gi srog gi snying
233b2(tsa): po phul te/ dregs pa can thams cad btul nas/ lha'i tshig bden pas zhal gyis ches shing dam mnos// lha srin sde brgyad bran dang chang khyur bsgoms
233b3(tsa): nas/ phyi'i dam tshig dkar po'i mu ran gyi 'khor srung zhing // ngan song gsum po rim kyis lha dang mi'i bde ba la 'khod cing / sems can thams cad rigs 'dzin
233b4(tsa): gyi sa la gnas par mthong zhing rtogs pa dang / la las rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skus/ lha'i khang pa rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i gnas nas/
233b5(tsa): khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar sku sprul te/ dbang phyug chen po'i srin po dang / dregs pa can thams cad bsgral zhing / thal ba yod pa'i zhing
233b6(tsa): khams nas/ slar dran pa rnyed par byas te/ bdud dang srin po thams cad btul zhing tshar bcad nas/ 'khor dang bran du byas te bka' dang dam tshig mnos nas
233b7(tsa): lha dang / lha ma yin pa dang / mi dang // mi ma yin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ bka' dang bstan pa bsrung ba dang / 'khor dang gang zag skyong bar g.yar
234a1(tsa): gyis ches te/ 'dod khams dang / gzugs khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la sogs pa thams cad// rim kyis
234a2(tsa): sangs rgyas kyi sa la bkod par mthong zhing rtogs pa dang / la las 'di ltar yum gyi mkha' la/ rgyal ba rigs lnga rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa las/
234a3(tsa): khro bo dang / dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud 'di ltar/ bdud dang ru dra rim kyis btul nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang sems can thams cad rim
234a4(tsa): kyis chos kyi dbyings bde ba chen po/ yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa la rim kyis 'khod par mthong zhing rtogs pa thams cad ni/ dpal kun tu bzang po ngo bo nyid
234a5(tsa): kyi sku/ chos nyid ma bcos pa'i byin gyis brlabs las snang ba las ma gtogs pa/ so sor snang zhing gnyis su med par bstan pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
234a6(tsa): de ni rtag pa dang mtshan ma can ma yin pa'i tha tshig go// de lta bu'i chos 'dri thams cad las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsam du yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
234a7(tsa): dmigs pa med cing / me dmigs pa'i tha tshig go// de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thams cad la bskal pa dpag gi mi lang bar yang brjod pa'i mtha' med la/ skad cig
234b1(tsa): yud tsam cig ma brjod par yang thams cad 'dus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni yun ring ba dang thung ba med pa'i tha tshig go// de lta bu'i chos 'di thams cad ni/ thugs
234b2(tsa): zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos par/ sku 'bar ba'i cha lugs khro bo dang / khro mo'i sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang la/ de ltar snang tsam na thugs
234b3(tsa): zhi ba'i ngang las kyang g.yos pa rdul tsam yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ma g.yos pa'i tha tshig go/ de lta bu'i chos 'di thams cad la// mtha' yang med
234b4(tsa): la/ dbus kyang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad du nye ring dang // thams cad du phyogs ris dang / thams cad du snga phyi dang / thams cad du che chung med pa'i
234b5(tsa): don no// de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs ye shes pa la gnas so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i thugs la
234b6(tsa): gnas so// kun tu bzang po yang rang gi sems la gnas so// rang gi sems ni nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' ni ci la yang min// ci la yang mi gnas
234b7(tsa): bas chos 'di dag thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'dus ma byas shing smra bsam gyi yul las 'das/ 'das pas brjod du med pa'i chos nyid do// brjod du med pa skye
235a1(tsa): 'gag med pa'i chos nyid do// skye 'gag med pa las ma g.yos pas// ma g.yos pa btsal du med pas/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad
235a2(tsa): 'joms shing mi gnas par byed pas khro mo zhes bya la// de las skye zhing 'byung bar byed pas yum zhes bya la/ de lta bu'i las thams cad la rol pas yab ces kyang
235a3(tsa): bya la/ de'i ngang la 'du 'bral med pa'i rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab kyi don la mkhas pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni dus thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs la gnas
235a4(tsa): pas 'di ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni phyag gis mdzad pa phyag rgya'o// thugs la gzhag pa dgongs pa'o// zhal du brjod pa gsung rab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
235a5(tsa): de ni don thams cad 'dus pas// dper na rgya mtsho chen po las klu'i rgyal po'i stobs kyis// chu bo dang chu bran char la sogs par spros nas/ slar rgya mtsho chen por
235a6(tsa): 'dus pa dang 'dra bar/ dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud chen po 'di las/ rnal 'byor gyi skyes bu chen po'i dgongs pas/ lta ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / dkyil 'khor
235a7(tsa): dang / sgom pa la sogs par byung nas/ slar 'di nyid du 'dus so// dpal 'bar khro mo'i rgyud 'di ni/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rgyud 'di la brten
235b1(tsa): nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rgyud 'di'i don rtogs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la// de bzhin
235b2(tsa): du phyis 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang rgyud 'di'i don rtogs nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dper na
235b3(tsa): u dum 'bar ba'i tshal ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i dpe yin la/ u du ma 'bar ra'i tshal dang / a ru ra'i tshal dang / tsan dan gyi nags la sogs
235b4(tsa): pa rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi nad 'jil ba'i mthu yod pa dang 'dra bar na/ rgyud 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dpe yang yin la/ sems can thams
235b5(tsa): cad kyi lus ngag yid gsum phyag rgya chen po'i ngang bzhin du gyur pa yang yin no// rgyud 'di'i don ma rig cing ma rtogs na/ nyon mongs pa ma rig pa'i bdud dang / phung po
235b6(tsa): sdug bsngal gyi drad dang / lha'i bu mya ngan gyi bdud dang / 'chi bdag mi rtag pa'i bdud de/ dper na nad dang rims la sogs pa dang po dbugs la zhugs// zhugs
235b7(tsa): nas rtsa la rgyu'o// de nas sha dang khrag la rgyu'o// de nas rkang dang sril 'khol lo// de nas srog pa rtsa la 'dus nas mi rtag pa'i las su 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa'i
236a1(tsa): phal pa rnams ni/ srog pa rtsa las chung zad 'khod nas/ sha dang rus pa la phyir byung nas/ khrag dang ba spu la byung ste/ phyi'i 'byung ba la ltos
236a2(tsa): so// de bzhin du bdud dang nyon mongs pa la sogs pa thams cad dang po rgyu ma rig pa las byung ngo // de nas nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi ying dang yid kyis rnam par shes pa bcad
236a3(tsa): nas ku na ga zhi la las sna tshogs kyi bag chags sna tshogs sur sogs so// de nas sems can sdug bsngal gyi gtan zhing du 'khyams so// de las sman bzang po dang
236a4(tsa): sman pa mkhas pa 'dra'o// rgyud 'di ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/ 'di ston pa dang 'chang ba'i rdo rje slob dpon dang phrad na/ sdug bsngal nyid byang chub yin pa dang /
236a5(tsa): nyon mongs pa nyid la ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa nyid chos nyid yin pa dang / 'khor ba nyid yang dag pa'i lam gnas su bstan pas/ gzung 'dzin gyis 'chel ba thams
236a6(tsa): cad chos nyid bde ba chen por ye nas gnas pa las/ thams cad lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par mdzad do// don de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rgyud 'di ni dam tshig la
236a7(tsa): mi gnas pa dang / snod ma yin pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin te/ dper na nor bu rin po che tir ma ka ni/ lha'i dbang po dang klu'i dbang po'i bsod nams yin pa dang 'dra
236b1(tsa): bar/ 'di ni dam tshig la gnas shing snod du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod yul yin pa'o// de lta bu'i rgyud 'di ni 'og min gyi gnas dang / skye mched mu bzhi dang / 'dod khams dang //
236b2(tsa): gzugs khams kyi lha'i ris su khyab na yang / ril lus ma bor bar phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su grangs dang tshom bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
236b3(tsa): par 'gyur ro// de nas lha dang / mi dang / klu'i gnas su khyab na yang // ril lus ma bor bar tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su grangs dang tshom bu bsam gyis mi
236b4(tsa): khyab pa/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de dag thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod par byed do//
236b5(tsa): de nas kyang thabs dang shes rab tu ldan pas rigs nges pa'i sras su bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i rgyur gzhag pa'i phyir/ thugs gsang ba'i mdzod thugs kyi sa bon//
236b6(tsa): yi ge 'bru gzhag nas slar 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i phyir/ phyag rgya chen pos kha bcad de gzhag go// de lta bu'i rgyud 'di'i rang bzhin du/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad
236b7(tsa): dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad sangs rgyas par bstan pa las// rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i lha'i
237a1(tsa): dkyil 'khor du thams cad ril 'dus pa las/ phyis log pa'i phyogs dag byung ba la nan tan ji ltar bskyed par bgyi/ yab bde ba chen po bla na med
237a2(tsa): pas bka' stsal pa/ thams cad 'dir 'dus pa la phyis log pa 'byung ba la nan tan bskyed pa legs so legs so// legs pa'i lam las log par 'byung ba ni/
237a3(tsa): dper na rgyal po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la las// rigs 'chol te gdol pa 'am// bshan pa lta bu'i las byed pa ni// skye bo yongs kyis
237a4(tsa): kyang smad pa/ nye 'khor rnams kyis kyang spangs par 'gyur la/ de nyid kyang ris smras shing mi bde ba'i gnas su gyur nas/ rgyal po chen po'i bka' chad kyi gnas
237a5(tsa): su gyur pa dang 'dra bar/ gang zag gang zhig gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs pa 'am/ de la spyod pa 'am/ de la gnas pa gang yin pas log par gol te/ ting nge
237a6(tsa): 'dzin rnam pa brgyad kyis log par khrid pa ni 'di lta ste/ glang po phyal pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyu las gol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yeng ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
237a7(tsa): bslad pas 'chal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrul par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags par gzung ba'i ting nge 'dzin
237b1(tsa): dang / de'i mthu rtas pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// de la glang po phyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi dbang gang yang med par las thams cad las 'jug
237b2(tsa): pa'i las byed pa'o// rgyu las gol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gsang sngags thabs kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi gti mug dang / rang 'byan dang /
237b3(tsa): thug thub tu spyad pas lung med par nges pa'i lan brjod pa'o// g.yeng ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ glu gar dang / rol mo dang / bzhed de de
237b4(tsa): la sogs pa 'jig rten g.yeng ba'i chos la bsten pa ste/ don dang mi 'tshams par rtsa ba bdud rtsi las gol ba'o// bslad pas 'chal ba'i ting nge
237b5(tsa): 'dzin ni// chos nyid tshig dang / ming gi gdags su med pa las/ yod med rtag chad du bslang ba dang / sems las gzung 'dzin du gdags su med pa la/
237b6(tsa): skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur du bslad ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ bka' rgya mtshor ba 'byam dpag gis mi lang ba 'di/ sa bcu'i byang
237b7(tsa): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang thob par zad kyis// don ni ma rtogs pa la/ gang zag ming tsam mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams kyis// tshig gi sgros gdags pa dang /
238a1(tsa): skur pa gdab pa dang / tshig gi ke'u shang gis bslad pa rnams ni gang zag 'tshal bar 'gyur te/ don med pa'i las su rtsal ba'o//
238a2(tsa): mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gab pa dang gsang ba'i sbas pa la mi gnas par/ rdzas dang / lag cha dang / yo byad la mngon par
238a3(tsa): 'chel te/ mtshan mar 'dzin te mu stegs dang 'dra bar spyod pa'o// 'khrul par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ yang dag pa'i don bstan pa las
238a4(tsa): swAn+tha sngags dang / rang bzo dang / khye'u shang dang / sdeb sbyor dang / phyogs char 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten pa ste/ 'khrul pa'i dbang gis rigs
238a5(tsa): 'dzin cing gzhan smod par byed do// chags par gzung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ stan dang ga na la sogs pa chos nyid la khungs 'byin cing /
238a6(tsa): de nyid ma mthong non dang / btsan thabs dang / 'dod pa'i dbang ba can du spyod pa ni// kA shan pa'am smad 'tshong ma lta bu la brten pa'o//
238a7(tsa): dri'i mthu rtas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ de dag log pa'i lam la mthu rtas pas/ yi dgas srin po'i gzugs su snang ba dang / dmyal ba'i 'jig rten dang /
238b1(tsa): yi dgas kyi 'jig rten dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du smin pa dang / de dag lus ngag yid gsum rab tu khro ga tu mche zhing / shin tu gdul dka' ba rnams so//
238b2(tsa): de dag la ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin zhes bya zhe na/ de dag la gtsor blangs te rtse gcig pa dang bcas pas nan tan du gzung ste spyod pa'o// de lta bu'i ting nge
238b3(tsa): 'dzin brgyad po la gnas pa ni// skye bo yongs kyis dpyas shing smad pa dang // de nyid ya ka dang sgro skur du gyur pas// rnal 'byor pa yongs kyis smad cing ba steng ba ste
238b4(tsa): dam tshig las nyams pas// byar ma rnams kyis kyang rab tu khrel te/ srog gi bar chad du byed cing / 'jig rten 'dir yang mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong
238b5(tsa): nas/ 'bras bu ngan song gsum du skye zhing // sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong nas/ shin tu gdungs pa'i smre sngags 'don cing // mgon dang skya bas med/
238b6(tsa): pa'i sdug bsngal bskal pa dpag tu med par sbyangs nas// de las thar nas kyang srin po chen po'i lus blangs te// srid pa gsum yang phung bar byas te/ sangs
238b7(tsa): rgyas thams cad kyi thugs khral du gyur nas/ bla na med pa'i the'u ka'i bka'achad kyis gong ma bzhin bsgral bar 'gyur ro// // rdo rje sems dpa'
239a1(tsa): gzhan yang ma brtags pa'i don brgyad kyis gol ba'i rgyur 'gyur te// de yang gang zhe na/ yin pa la ni ma yin par spros 'dogs pa dang
239a2(tsa): ma yin pa la yin par sgros 'dogs pa dang / mkhas pa la mi mkhas par skur pa 'debs pa dang / mi mkhas pa la mkhas par bstod pa dang / theg pa 'og ma rnams
239a3(tsa): la gong ma yin zhes che ba 'byin par byed pa dang / gong ma la 'og ma yin zhes smod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la bdud kyi tshig yin zhes smod pa
239a4(tsa): dang / bdud kyi tshig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yin zhes smra ba'o// de la yin pa la ma yin par sgro 'dogs pa ni/ chos nyid dam
239a5(tsa): pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs mngon du phyung ba 'di dag/ snod ma yin pa la gsang ba dang / phal gyis thos na skrag cing skur
239a6(tsa): pa 'debs pa dang / smod par gyur pas kun gyi thun mong ma yin te/ rang bzhin gyi gsang ba 'di la// gang zag dad pa chung ba dang / shes rab zhan pa
239a7(tsa): dang / thos pa chung ba rnams kyis 'di dag gi don la 'phya zhing 'phral sdebs dang mos btsan du byas pa yin// yang dag pa ma yin no/ zhes sgro 'dogs
239b1(tsa): par byed do// ma yin pa la yin par sgro 'dogs pa ni phal che khye'u shang dang / rang bzo la sogs pa thos pa chung zhing shes rab dman pa dang /
239b2(tsa): 'gal ba'i don ma rig pa'i tshig sde bas dang / phar bslad pa tshur bsres pa bcol ba rnams la smon pa 'bul te/ bzang ste don yod do zhes sgro 'dogs par
